request.description:
### API Endpoint: Video - Event - Create - Calendly

#### Request Method
- **Method**: `POST`
- **Description**: This request type is used to create a new video event.

#### Request URL
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`
- **Description**: This is the endpoint where the API request is sent to create a video event.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`
  - **Description**: This header indicates that the data being sent to the server is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
- **Body**: 
  - **Mode**: `raw`
  - **Description**: The body of the request contains the necessary details for creating the video event in JSON format.

##### Options Object
- **providerName**: `"calendly"`
  - **Description**: Name of the provider for scheduling (here, it's Calendly).
  
- **providerId**: `""`
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the provider. This can be empty if not applicable.

- **apiKey**: `null`
  - **Description**: Key used to authenticate API requests with the specified provider. Currently set to null.

- **apiSecret**: `null`
  - **Description**: Secret key for the API. This is also null at the moment.

- **apiClientId**: `null`
  - **Description**: Client ID for the API, currently not set.

- **authToken**: `null`
  - **Description**: Token for authenticating the user's session, also set to null.

- **server**: `null`
  - **Description**: Server information is not provided.

- **rtmpUrl**: `null`
  - **Description**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol streaming, currently not assigned.

- **streamKey**: `null`
  - **Description**: Key to access the streaming service; not set in this request.

- **channelUrl**: `null`
  - **Description**: URL for the channel, currently left empty.

- **authUsername**: `null`
  - **Description**: Username for authentication, not specified.

- **authPassword**: `null`
  - **Description**: Password for authentication, also not specified.

- **uniqueKey**: `"uniqueKey"`
  - **Description**: A unique identifier for the event to ensure it is distinguishable.

- **videoId**: `"videoId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the video associated with this event.

- **accountId**: `"accountId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the account that owns the event.

- **channelId**: `"channelId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the channel where the event will be streamed.

- **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the specific session of the video event.

- **streamId**: `"streamId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the streaming instance.

- **ipAddress**: `null`
  - **Description**: IP address of the user creating the event, not specified.

- **country**: `"United States"`
  - **Description**: The country where the event is being held.

- **state**: `"California"`
  - **Description**: The state where the event is located.

- **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
  - **Description**: The title of the video event.

- **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
  - **Description**: A brief description of what the event is about.

- **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
  - **Description**: Keywords associated with the event for categorization.

##### Details Object
- **accountId**: `"accountId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the account managing the event.

- **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
  - **Description**: Specific identifier for the session of the event.

- **channelId**: `"channelId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the channel of the event.

- **videoId**: `"videoId"`
  - **Description**: Identifier for the related video content.

- **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
  - **Description**: Title of the video event.

- **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
  - **Description**: Detailed description of the event.

- **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
  - **Description**: Tags representing the content of the event.

- **streamType**: `"Live"`
  - **Description**: Indicates that the event will be streamed live.

- **searchType**: `"Game"`
  - **Description**: Type of content to be displayed in search results.

- **started**: `true`
  - **Description**: Indicates whether the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
  - **Description**: Timestamp of when the stream started.

- **paused**: `false`
  - **Description**: Indicates whether the stream is currently paused.

- **pausedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
  - **Description**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused, if applicable.

- **stopped**: `false`
  - **Description**: Indicates whether the stream has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: `null`
  - **Description**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently not set.

- **streamId**: `"streamId"`
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the specific stream.

- **channel**: `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`
  - **Description**: Name of the channel hosting the event.

- **category**: `"Board"`
  - **Description**: The category under which the event is classified.

- **categoryId**: `"categoryId"`
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the event’s category.

- **subCategory**: `"Outdoor Party"`
  - **Description**: Subcategory for further classification of the event.

- **subCategoryId**: `"subCategoryId"`
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate**: `"2024-02-01"`
  - **Description**: Date when the event is scheduled to take place.

- **scheduleTime**: `"18:00:00"`
  - **Description**: Time when the event is set to begin.

- **streamHours**: `1`
  - **Description**: Duration of the planned event in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`
  - **Description**: URL for the cover photo associated with the event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
  - **Description**: URL for playback of the event video from the provider; currently not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`
  - **Description**: Number of tokens available for voting during the event.

- **votingTimeReset**: `"5"`
  - **Description**: Reset time for voting in minutes.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`
  - **Description**: Number of voting buttons available for participants.

- **voteButtonText1**: `"Layup"`
  - **Description**: Text label for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: `"Dunk"`
  - **Description**: Text label for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`
  - **Description**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the event; currently disabled.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`
  - **Description**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled for this event.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: `"Hit"`
  - **Description**: Text for the first button in the tournament.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: `"Miss"`
  - **Description**: Text for the second button in the tournament.

- **streamLocatorName**: `"basketball-locator-name"`
  - **Description**: Name for the stream's locator.

- **streamAssetName**: `"basketball-asset-name"`
  - **Description**: Name for the asset used in the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**: 
  - **Description**: Object indicating whether specific video IDs are set for various platforms; all currently set to false.

- **platformEventIds**: 
  - **Description**: Object indicating whether specific event IDs are established for various platforms; all currently false.

- **primaryCameraName**: `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`
  - **Description**: Name of the primary camera being used for the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`
  - **Description**: Name of the primary microphone used.

- **primarySpeakerName**: `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`
  - **Description**: Name of the primary speaker setup.

- **additionalCameras**: 
  - **Description**: Array containing additional camera and microphone pairs used during the event.

- **createdDate**: `"2024-02-18"`
  - **Description**: The date when the event was created.

- **createdTime**: `"14:54:25"`
  - **Description**: The time when the event was created.

- **updatedDate**: `"2024-02-24"`
  - **Description**: The date when the event details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `"23:29:19"`
  - **Description**: The time when the event details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`
  - **Description**: Date when the event was deleted, currently not applicable.

- **deletedTime**: `null`
  - **Description**: Time when the event was deleted, not set.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Calendly

#### Method
- **PUT**: This HTTP method is used to update the existing video event details at the specified endpoint.

#### URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the URL where the request is sent to update the video event.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

1. **Options**:  
   This section contains configuration and metadata related to the video event.
   - **providerName**: The name of the service provider (e.g., "calendly") being used for the integration.
   - **providerId**: The unique identifier for the service provider.
   - **apiKey**: The API key for authenticating with the service provider, if required.
   - **apiSecret**: The API secret for added security during authentication.
   - **apiClientId**: The client ID associated with the application or service.
   - **authToken**: Authorization token for user sessions, if applicable.
   - **server**: The server address if the streaming needs to be routed through a specific server.
   - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming.
   - **streamKey**: A unique key that identifies the stream for authentication purposes.
   - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel associated with this stream.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication if required.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication if required.
   - **uniqueKey**: A distinct key to identify the event uniquely.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being updated.
   - **accountId**: The unique ID of the user’s account tied to the video.
   - **channelId**: The ID corresponding to the channel where the video is streamed.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session of the event.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the current live stream.
   - **ipAddress**: Optional IP address of the user or server.
   - **country**: The country information associated with the event; defaults to "United States."
   - **state**: The state information associated with the event; defaults to "California."
   - **title**: The title of the event; for example, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
   - **description**: A brief description of the event, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - **tags**: Comma-separated keywords associated with the event for categorization, like "basketball, game, challenge."

2. **Details**:  
   This section outlines specific details and statuses of the video event.
   - **accountId**: The same account ID as in options, indicating ownership.
   - **sessionId**: Session ID, matching the ID in options.
   - **channelId**: Channel ID, echoing the ID in options.
   - **videoId**: Video identifier, consistent with the ID provided in options.
   - **title**: Title of the event similar to options.
   - **description**: Description of the event, same as provided in options.
   - **tags**: Tags information repeated from options.
   - **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream; in this case, "Live."
   - **searchType**: The category by which the event is searchable; marked as "Game."
   - **started**: Boolean value indicating if the event has begun.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the event started.
   - **paused**: Indicates if the event is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the event was paused.
   - **stopped**: Specifies if the event has stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the event was stopped, which may be null if it hasn't stopped.
   - **streamId**: Stream identifier, aligned with the options section.
   - **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel."
   - **category**: General category of the event, like "Board."
   - **categoryId**: Unique ID identifying the category.
   - **subCategory**: More detailed category description, e.g., "Outdoor Party."
   - **subCategoryId**: ID corresponding to the subcategory.
   - **scheduleDate**: The date that the event is scheduled for, e.g., "2024-02-01."
   - **scheduleTime**: The time the event is scheduled to start, e.g., "18:00:00."
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service provider, if applicable.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time duration in seconds to reset the voting process.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, e.g., "Layup."
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, e.g., "Dunk."
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean value indicating if rewards are enabled for voting.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournament features are active.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button related to tournament actions, e.g., "Hit."
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button related to tournament actions, e.g., "Miss."
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name given to the stream locator.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name given to the stream asset.
   - **platformVideoIds**: An object containing boolean values indicating the presence of video IDs across various platforms like YouTube and Twitch.
   - **platformEventIds**: An object containing boolean values indicating the presence of event IDs across different platforms, such as Facebook and LinkedIn.
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used, e.g., "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam."
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, e.g., "WirelessAudioTek Device."
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, e.g., "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0."
   - **additionalCameras**: An array containing objects with names of additional cameras and their respective microphones.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: Optional field indicating the date if the event was deleted; null if not deleted.
   - **deletedTime**: Optional field indicating the time if the event was deleted; null if not deleted.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Delete - Calendly

#### Request Information
- **Method**: POST
  - This is the HTTP method used to send the request. In this case, it will create a new entry or perform an action on the provided endpoint.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is sent. The endpoint is intended to be used for deleting a video event from the system.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header indicates that the content type being sent in the request body is JSON.

#### Request Body

The body of the request is structured in two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: `"calendly"`

- **providerId**: `""`

- **apiKey**: `null`

- **videoId**: `"videoId"`

- **country**: `"United States"`

- **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`

- **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`

##### Details
- **accountId**: `"accountId"`

- **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
  - Same as in options; the identifier for the session during which the event took place.

- **channelId**: `"channelId"`

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Create - Eventbrite

This endpoint allows users to create a video event specifically for Eventbrite. The request sends a JSON body detailing the event's configurations and metadata.

#### Request Object:
- **Method**: Specifies that this request is a `POST`, indicating new data is being sent to create an event.
- **URL**: The endpoint where the request is sent, in this case, `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`.
- **Headers**:
  - `Content-Type`: This specifies the media type of the resource. It is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Body Object:
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options:
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider for the event. Here, it is set to `"eventbrite"`.
- **providerId**: This field is reserved for an ID associated with the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId, authToken, server, rtmpUrl, streamKey, channelUrl**: These fields are placeholders for various credentials and URLs required for integrating with Eventbrite but are set to `null` or empty in the request.
- **authUsername, authPassword**: Authentication details, currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the event, set to `"uniqueKey"`.
- **videoId**: This represents the ID of the video that will be associated with the event, currently a placeholder.
- **accountId**: The ID of the user's account, currently a placeholder.
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the event will be broadcasted, currently a placeholder.
- **sessionId**: An identifier for the streaming session, currently a placeholder.
- **streamId**: An identifier for the stream, currently a placeholder.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made, set to `null`.
- **country**: The country associated with the event, here it is specified as `"United States"`.
- **state**: The state associated with the event, currently set as `"California"`.
- **title**: The title of the event, in this case, `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
- **description**: A brief description of the event, in this case, `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
- **tags**: Tags related to the event to help with categorization, set to `"basketball,game,challenge"`.

##### Details:
- **accountId**: Similar to options, represents the user's account ID.
- **sessionId, channelId, videoId**: Identifiers for the session, channel, and video respectively, repeated from options.
- **title and description**: Same as above, providing the event's title and descriptive content.
- **tags**: Repeated tags for categorizing the event.
- **streamType**: The type of the stream, set to `"Live"`.
- **searchType**: Indicates how the event can be searched, here it is marked as `"Game"`.
- **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started, set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: The timestamp when the event started, here specified as `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`.
- **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is paused, set to `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, currently given as `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has stopped, currently set to `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream stopped, currently `null`.
- **streamId**: A unique identifier for the stream, currently a placeholder.
- **channel**: The name of the channel broadcasting the event, set to `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`.
- **category**: The main category of the event, set as `"Board"`.
- **categoryId**: Category identification, currently a placeholder.
- **subCategory**: A sub-category for the event, marked as `"Outdoor Party"`.
- **subCategoryId**: Sub-category identification, currently a placeholder.
- **scheduleDate**: The date scheduled for the event, set to `"2024-02-01"`.
- **scheduleTime**: The time scheduled for the event's start, set as `"18:00:00"`.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, here it is set to `1`.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: A URL linking to the event's cover photo, currently set to `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL for the provider, currently left empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting, set to `100`.
- **votingTimeReset**: Amount of time reset for voting, set to `"5"`.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available, set to `4`.
- **voteButtonText1 and voteButtonText2**: Text for the first two vote buttons, set as `"Layup"` and `"Dunk"`.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating if rewards are enabled, set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean indicating if a tournament is enabled, set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1 and tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the buttons related to the tournament, set to `"Hit"` and `"Miss"`.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for tracking the stream, set as `"basketball-locator-name"`.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset for the stream, set to `"basketball-asset-name"`.
- **platformVideoIds**: An object for holding IDs for various platforms where the video may also be posted, all set to `false` for this request.
- **platformEventIds**: An object for holding event IDs for various platforms, similarly all set to `false`.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the event, specified as `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used, set as `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`.
- **primarySpeakerName**: The speaker used for the event, listed as `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`.
- **additionalCameras**: An array providing details of any additional cameras and microphones used. Each entry specifies a camera and its corresponding microphone.
- **createdDate and createdTime**: The date and time when the event was created, marked as `"2024-02-18"` and `"14:54:25"` respectively.
- **updatedDate and updatedTime**: The last date and time the event was updated, specified as `"2024-02-24"` and `"23:29:19"`.
- **deletedDate and deletedTime**: Fields indicating when the event was deleted, both currently set to `null`.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Each Data in the Endpoint

- **options**: This object contains configuration details for the video streaming event.
  - **providerName**: The name of the streaming service provider (e.g., "eventbrite").
  - **providerId**: The unique identifier for the provider, if available.
  - **apiKey**: API key for authenticating requests to the streaming service, if required.
  - **apiSecret**: Secret key used along with the API key to authenticate, if necessary.
  - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API access, if applicable.
  - **authToken**: Token for authorization in requests, if applicable.
  - **server**: Server location or address for the streaming, if provided.
  - **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) stream, if applicable.
  - **streamKey**: Key used for authenticating the stream.
  - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel where the stream is hosted.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication if a server requires login.
  - **authPassword**: Password for the corresponding username.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this particular event or stream.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account linked to the streaming service.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the event.
  - **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the streaming session.
  - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **ipAddress**: IP address from which the stream is being initiated.
  - **country**: Country where the event is located (default is "United States").
  - **state**: State where the event is being held (default is "California").
  - **title**: Title of the event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
  - **description**: A short description giving details about the event.
  - **tags**: Comma-separated list of tags describing the event (e.g., "basketball, game, challenge").

- **details**: This object provides specific information and status about the video event.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the account, mirrored from options.
  - **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the session, mirrored from options.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the event, mirrored from options.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed, mirrored from options.
  - **title**: Title of the event, mirrored from options.
  - **description**: Description of the event, mirrored from options.
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the event, mirrored from options.
  - **streamType**: Type of the stream, indicating the format (e.g., "Live").
  - **searchType**: Type of content for search purposes (e.g., "Game").
  - **started**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating whether the stream is currently paused.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has been stopped.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, mirrored from options.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
  - **category**: Main category of the event (e.g., "Board").
  - **categoryId**: Identifier corresponding to the category.
  - **subCategory**: More specific category under the main category (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier corresponding to the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date scheduled for the event (e.g., "2024-02-01").
  - **scheduleTime**: Time scheduled for the event (e.g., "18:00:00").
  - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the event.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback of the event, if provided.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time reset for voting options.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons displayed.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
  - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards for participation are enabled.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournament features are enabled.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament option button.
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament option button.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for the stream asset.
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing platform-specific video identifiers. Each key represents an output identifier for a specific platform (such as YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, etc.)
  - **platformEventIds**: Object containing platform-specific event identifiers, mirroring structure of the platformVideoIds but pertaining to event IDs.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for the event.
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speaker used for sound output.
  - **additionalCameras**: Array detailing additional cameras and microphones used (each object includes name for both).
  - **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
  - **createdTime**: Time the event was created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the event details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time the event details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, if applicable.
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, if applicable.

request.description:
### API Endpoint: Video - Event - Delete - Eventbrite

#### Request Method: 
- **POST**: This API endpoint is used to submit data to be processed by the server, specifically for deleting a video event.

#### Request URL:
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete**: The URL where the API request will be sent.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type**: 
  - **Value**: `application/json`
  - **Description**: Specifies the media type of the resource; in this case, it's indicating that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Body:
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`, both formatted as JSON.

##### Options:
This section contains parameters related to the event video being deleted.
- **providerName**: Indicates the service provider, here it is set to "eventbrite".
- **providerId**: Identifies the specific provider instance (left empty).
- **apiKey**: A key for accessing the API (null in this case).
- **apiSecret**: A secret key paired with the API key (null in this case).
- **apiClientId**: Identifier for the API client (null in this case).
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication (null in this case).
- **server**: Information about the server (null in this case).
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (null in this case).
- **streamKey**: Unique key for streaming (null in this case).
- **channelUrl**: URL for the video channel (null in this case).
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication (null in this case).
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication (null in this case).
- **uniqueKey**: Unique identifier for the video.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video to be deleted.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account related to the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream itself.
- **ipAddress**: IP address associated with the video stream (null in this case).
- **country**: Country where the event took place (set to "United States").
- **state**: State where the event occurred (set to "California").
- **title**: Title of the video event (set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: Description of the video event (details of the basketball challenge).
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video event for easier searching (set to "basketball,game,challenge").

##### Details:
This section provides detailed information about the video event that is targeted for deletion.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session during which the video was streamed.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel in which the video is hosted.
- **videoId**: Unique identifier of the video being deleted.
- **title**: Title of the event video.
- **description**: Description providing more context about the event.
- **tags**: Tags for categorizing the video event.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream (set to "Live").
- **searchType**: Type of content for search optimization (set to "Game").
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started (true).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused (false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused (if applicable).
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped (false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (null if not applicable).
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event (set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
- **category**: Main category of the event (set to "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: More specific category for the event (set to "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled (set to "2024-02-01").
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled (set to "18:00:00").
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours (set to 1).
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the event provider.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting related to the event (set to 100).
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds to reset voting (set to 5).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons displayed (set to 4).
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button (set to "Layup").
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button (set to "Dunk").
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled (false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled (true).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in the tournament (set to "Hit").
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in the tournament (set to "Miss").
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream (set to "basketball-locator-name").
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset (set to "basketball-asset-name").
- **platformVideoIds**: Object listing video IDs across various platforms (all set to false to indicate none are linked).
- **platformEventIds**: Object listing event IDs across social platforms (all set to false for no links).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the event.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for the event.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the event.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects containing additional cameras and microphones used during the event.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted (null if not applicable).
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted (null if not applicable).

request.description:
### Detailed Description of the Data in the Endpoint

#### Request Metadata
- **name**: This is the title of the request and indicates its function. In this case, it represents a request to create a video event specifically for a Facebook group.

#### Request Method
- **method**: Specifies the HTTP method used for the request. Here, it is a POST request, which typically means data is being submitted or created on the server.

#### Request URL
- **url**: The endpoint URL where the request is sent. It points to the local server running on port 3000 that handles video event creation.

#### Request Headers
- **headers**: An array of key-value pairs. The `Content-Type` specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
- **body**: This section contains the data that is submitted in the request.

##### Options
- **options**: Contains various parameters for configuring the event.
  - **providerName**: Indicates the service provider for the video event. Here, it's set to "facebookGroup".
  - **providerId**: A unique identifier for the service provider (not specified in this example).
  - **apiKey / apiSecret / apiClientId / authToken / server / rtmpUrl / streamKey / channelUrl / authUsername / authPassword**: These fields are used for authentication and configuration with the video provider, but they are not provided in this case.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique key to identify this specific video event.
  - **videoId**: Identifies the specific video being used or created.
  - **accountId**: Represents the account associated with the event.
  - **channelId**: Specifies the channel under which the video event is being created.
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session of the event.
  - **streamId**: Refers to a unique identifier for the stream itself.
  - **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request originates (not provided).
  - **country**: Indicates the country where the event is taking place, here it is set to "United States".
  - **state**: Indicates the state within the country, set to "California".
  - **title**: The title of the video event, here it is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: A brief description of the event, detailing what it is about.
  - **tags**: Keywords that describe the video event for easier search categorization, separated by commas.

##### Details
- **details**: This section provides more in-depth specifics about the event.
  - **accountId / sessionId / channelId / videoId**: These fields again indicate the identifiers related to the account, session, channel, and video respectively.
  - **title / description / tags**: These fields repeat the information already provided in the options.
  - **streamType**: Specifies the type of the stream; in this case, it's a "Live" stream.
  - **searchType**: Indicates the category used for searching the event, identified here as "Game".
  - **started / paused / stopped**: Boolean values indicating whether the stream has started, been paused, or stopped.
  - **startedOn / pausedOn / stoppedOn**: Timestamps indicating when the stream was started, paused, or stopped.
  - **streamId**: Repeat of the stream identifier.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel where the event is hosted; here, it's "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
  - **category**: Main category of the event, such as "Board".
  - **categoryId**: Unique identifier for the main category (not provided).
  - **subCategory / subCategoryId**: Denotes the sub-category of the event and its identifier.
  - **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled to take place.
  - **scheduleTime**: Time for when the event is set to begin.
  - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover image of the event.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider (not specified).
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available for interaction during the event.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds for resetting the voting period.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of available voting buttons during the event.
  - **voteButtonText1 / voteButtonText2**: Text labels for the vote buttons.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are available during the event; set to false.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Specifies if a tournament feature is enabled; set to true.
  - **tournamentButtonText1 / tournamentButtonText2**: Text for tournament interaction buttons.
  - **streamLocatorName / streamAssetName**: Names assigned to the stream locator and asset respectively.
  - **platformVideoIds**: A collection of identifiers for videos across various platforms, all set to false in this instance.
  - **platformEventIds**: A similar collection of identifiers for events on different platforms, also all set to false.
  - **primaryCameraName / primaryMicrophoneName / primarySpeakerName**: Names of the primary camera, microphone, and speaker used for the event.
  - **additionalCameras**: An array of objects indicating additional cameras and microphones that may be used.
  - **createdDate / createdTime**: Timestamps when the event was created.
  - **updatedDate / updatedTime**: Timestamps when the event was last updated.
  - **deletedDate / deletedTime**: Timestamps for when the event was deleted (if applicable, otherwise null).

request.description:
### Description of the Endpoint - Video - Event - Update - Facebook Group

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update an existing resource on the server.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the endpoint where the update request is sent.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the body of the request contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
The body of the request includes two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the provider where the video is being broadcasted. Here it is set to "facebookGroup".
- **providerId**: (String) The identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: (Nullable) Key for API access, currently null.
- **apiSecret**: (Nullable) Secret key for API access, currently null.
- **apiClientId**: (Nullable) Client ID for API access, currently null.
- **authToken**: (Nullable) Authentication token, currently null.
- **server**: (Nullable) Server information, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: (Nullable) RTMP URL for streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: (Nullable) Key needed for the live stream, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: (Nullable) URL for the channel where the video is streamed, currently null.
- **authUsername**: (Nullable) Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: (Nullable) Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account managing the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the stream is hosted.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the dynamic stream.
- **ipAddress**: (Nullable) IP address of the broadcasting party, currently null.
- **country**: The country where the event is being held, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state where the event is located, set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the streaming event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Brief details about the event, stating it's a basketball game featuring exciting plays and challenges.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the event, set as "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Details
- **accountId**: Identifier for the associated account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video.
- **title**: The title of the event as mentioned in options.
- **description**: The description of the event as mentioned in options.
- **tags**: The tags associated with the event as mentioned in options.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, here it is set to "Live".
- **searchType**: Indicates the type of content being presented; here it is set to "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused, currently the same as started.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped, set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: (Nullable) Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Associated identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Category of the content; here it is "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, currently unspecified.
- **subCategory**: Further classification, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory, currently unspecified.
- **scheduleDate**: Date the event is scheduled for, set as "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time the event is scheduled for, set as "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the event in hours, set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, given as "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: (Nullable) URL for playback from the provider, currently unspecified.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds to reset voting, set to 5.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Identifier for locating the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Identifier for the stream asset, set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing output IDs for multiple platforms, all currently set to false indicating not applicable for each platform.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for multiple platforms, all currently set to false indicating not applicable for each platform.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio, set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and their associated microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event entry was created, set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the event entry was created, set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event entry was last updated, set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event entry was last updated, set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: (Nullable) Date when the entry was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: (Nullable) Time when the entry was deleted, currently null.

This structured explanation aims to clarify each field's significance for developers and users interacting with the API.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Delete - Facebook Group

#### Request Method
- **Method**: Specifies the type of HTTP request being made. In this case, it's a `POST` request.

#### Request URL
- **URL**: The endpoint for sending the request, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`. This indicates that the request is aimed at a local server for deleting a video event.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: This header indicates the type of content being sent in the request. Here, it is set to `application/json`, meaning the body of the request will be in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main objects: `options` and `details`.

##### Options Object
1. **providerName**: The name of the service provider for the video event, set to `facebookGroup` to indicate that the event is associated with a Facebook group.
2. **providerId**: The identifier for the specific provider, which is currently an empty field.
3. **apiKey**: The API key required for authentication; it is null in this case.
4. **apiSecret**: The secret key for API access; it is also null.
5. **apiClientId**: The client ID for API authentication; left as null.
6. **authToken**: The authentication token needed to authorize the API request; currently null.
7. **server**: The server details for the streaming service; it is null here.
8. **rtmpUrl**: The URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; it's null, indicating no RTMP URL specified.
9. **streamKey**: A key used to identify the stream; it is null in this case.
10. **channelUrl**: The URL for the channel; currently set as null.
11. **authUsername**: The username for authentication, which is null.
12. **authPassword**: The password for authentication, also null.
13. **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event; in this case, it is set to `"uniqueKey"`.
14. **videoId**: The ID of the video being referenced for deletion, set to `"videoId"`.
15. **accountId**: The identifier for the user's account associated with the video event, set to `"accountId"`.
16. **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the event took place, set to `"channelId"`.
17. **sessionId**: The ID of the session corresponding to the event, set to `"sessionId"`.
18. **streamId**: The ID of the stream, designated as `"streamId"`.
19. **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made; it is currently null.
20. **country**: The country where the event takes place, set to `United States`.
21. **state**: The state where the event takes place, specified as `California`.
22. **title**: The title of the video event, here it is `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
23. **description**: A brief description of the video event, which is `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
24. **tags**: Tags associated with the event, formatted as a string: `"basketball,game,challenge"`.

##### Details Object
1. **accountId**: Reiterates the account ID linked to this event, set to `"accountId"`.
2. **sessionId**: Reiterates the session ID linked to this event, set to `"sessionId"`.
3. **channelId**: Reiterates the channel ID linked to this event, specified as `"channelId"`.
4. **videoId**: Reiterates the video ID for deletion, set to `"videoId"`.
5. **title**: Reiterates the title of the video event, `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
6. **description**: Reiterates the description of the event, `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
7. **tags**: Reiterates the tags for the event, `"basketball,game,challenge"`.
8. **streamType**: The type of stream indicates it is a `Live` stream.
9. **searchType**: This defines the search category for the event, which is `Game`.
10. **started**: A boolean indicating whether the event has started, here it is `true`.
11. **startedOn**: The timestamp when the event started, given as `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`.
12. **paused**: A boolean indicating if the event is paused; it is `false`.
13. **pausedOn**: The timestamp when the event was paused, set to `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`.
14. **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the event has stopped; it is `false`.
15. **stoppedOn**: The timestamp when the event was stopped; it is null, indicating it has not been stopped.
16. **streamId**: The ID of the stream, specified as `"streamId"`.
17. **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the event, here it is `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`.
18. **category**: The category of the event, specified as `"Board"`.
19. **categoryId**: The ID of the category, labeled as `"categoryId"`.
20. **subCategory**: The subcategory of the event; set to `"Outdoor Party"`.
21. **subCategoryId**: The ID for the subcategory, provided as `"subCategoryId"`.
22. **scheduleDate**: The date the event is scheduled for, set to `2024-02-01`.
23. **scheduleTime**: The time the event is scheduled, specified as `18:00:00`.
24. **streamHours**: The anticipated duration of the stream, set to `1` hour.
25. **coverPhotoUrl**: The URL for the cover photo of the event, specified as `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`.
26. **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service; left empty.
27. **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting; set to `100`.
28. **votingTimeReset**: The time in seconds for resetting voting, set to `5`.
29. **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of voting buttons available, set to `4`.
30. **voteButtonText1**: The text for the first vote button, here it is `"Layup"`.
31. **voteButtonText2**: The text for the second vote button, here it is `"Dunk"`.
32. **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating if rewards are enabled; set to `false`.
33. **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean indicating if the tournament feature is enabled; set to `true`.
34. **tournamentButtonText1**: The text for the first tournament button, set to `"Hit"`.
35. **tournamentButtonText2**: The text for the second tournament button, set to `"Miss"`.
36. **streamLocatorName**: The name used for locating the stream, specified as `"basketball-locator-name"`.
37. **streamAssetName**: The name assigned to the streaming asset, designated as `"basketball-asset-name"`.
38. **platformVideoIds**: An object containing IDs for various platforms indicating if a video ID exists for each; all set to `false`.
39. **platformEventIds**: An object containing IDs for platform events similarly indicating if an event ID exists for each; all set to `false`.
40. **primaryCameraName**: The name of the main camera being used, listed as `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`.
41. **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the main microphone being utilized, here it is `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`.
42. **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the main speaker system, specified as `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`.
43. **additionalCameras**: An array listing any additional cameras and their corresponding microphones being used.
44. **createdDate**: The date the video event was created, set to `"2024-02-18"`.
45. **createdTime**: The time the video event was created, set to `"14:54:25"`.
46. **updatedDate**: The date the video event was last updated, set to `"2024-02-24"`.
47. **updatedTime**: The time of the last update for the video event, set to `"23:29:19"`.
48. **deletedDate**: The date the video event was deleted; currently null.
49. **deletedTime**: The time the video event was deleted; currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Event - Create - Facebook Page

#### Request Method:
- **POST**: This method is used to send data to the server to create a new event related to a video.

#### Request URL:
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create**: This is the local endpoint where the request is sent to create a new video event.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource being sent. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body:

**1. options**: This object contains configuration settings for the video event.

- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the platform providing the service; here, it is set to `facebookPage`.
- **providerId**: An optional identifier for the provider, currently left blank.
- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId**: Credentials required for authentication with the service provider, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: Token for authenticating requests, currently set to null.
- **server**: URL of the server, currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming, currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: Unique key for the stream, currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel, currently set to null.
- **authUsername & authPassword**: Credentials for authentication, both currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the event.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the event will be streamed.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session of the event.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **ipAddress**: IP address from which the event is created, currently set to null.
- **country**: Country of the event, here set to `United States`.
- **state**: State of the event, set to `California`.
- **title**: Title of the video event, labeled `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`.
- **description**: A short description of the event, describing it as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Comma-separated keywords associated with the event, here: "basketball, game, challenge".

**2. details**: This object provides more specific information about the video event being created.

- **accountId**: Same as above; the account identifier.
- **sessionId**: Same as above; session identifier.
- **channelId**: Same as above; channel identifier.
- **videoId**: Same as above; video identifier.
- **title**: Same as above; title of the event.
- **description**: Same as above; description of the event.
- **tags**: Same as above; tags for the event.
- **streamType**: The type of streaming, here it is `Live`.
- **searchType**: The classification type for searching, here it indicates `Game`.
- **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused, currently pointing to the start time.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has stopped, set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream stopped, currently set to null.
- **streamId**: Same as above; the unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel for the event, identified as `Fortune's Basketball Channel`.
- **category**: General category for the event, labeled `Board`.
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, specified as `categoryId`.
- **subCategory**: More specific category, specified as `Outdoor Party`.
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory, specified as `subCategoryId`.
- **scheduleDate**: Date of the scheduled event, set to `2024-02-01`.
- **scheduleTime**: Time of the scheduled event, set to `18:00:00`.
- **streamHours**: Indicates the expected duration of the stream, set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo for the event, indicated as `basketball-cover-url.jpg`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL where the playback can be accessed, currently set to an empty string.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of vote tokens available for audience interaction, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in minutes to reset the voting, set to 5.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1 & voteButtonText2**: Text labels for the voting buttons, here indicating choices like `Layup` and `Dunk`.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for participation, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1 & tournamentButtonText2**: Text labels for the tournament buttons, indicating choices like `Hit` and `Miss`.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream, labeled `basketball-locator-name`.
- **streamAssetName**: Identifier for the specific stream asset, labeled `basketball-asset-name`.
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for different platforms, all currently set to false, indicating that no output IDs have been assigned:
  - Examples include `youtubeOutputId`, `twitchOutputId`, and many others.
  
- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for different social media/event platforms, all currently set to false:
  - Examples include `facebookGroupEventId`, `youTubeEventId`, and several others.
  
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for streaming, here it's `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used, which is `WirelessAudioTek Device`.
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker system used, identified as `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`.
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional cameras and their corresponding microphones being used for the event.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created, listed as `2024-02-18`.
- **createdTime**: Time of creation for the event, listed as `14:54:25`.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event details were last updated, listed as `2024-02-24`.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update, listed as `23:29:19`.
- **deletedDate**: Date the event was deleted, currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: Time the event was deleted, currently set to null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Facebook Page

#### Request Details
- **Method**: 
  - **PUT**: This HTTP method is used to send data to the server to update a resource. In this context, it is used to update event-related information for a video on a Facebook page.

- **URL**: 
  - **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the endpoint to which the request is sent. It is hosted locally on port 3000 and is designated for updating video event details.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: 
    - **application/json**: Indicates that the request body contains JSON data.

- **Body**: The body is structured with two main sections: `options` and `details`, both containing various fields relevant to the video event.

#### Options Section
- **providerName**: 
  - The name of the provider through which the event video is streamed. 
  - In this case, it's set to "facebookPage."

- **providerId**: 
  - An identifier for the provider. This may need to be filled based on the specific provider configuration.

- **apiKey**: 
  - API key for authentication, currently set to `null`.

- **apiSecret**: 
  - The secret key associated with the API key, currently set to `null`.

- **apiClientId**: 
  - The client identifier for the API, currently set to `null`.

- **authToken**: 
  - Token for authenticating with the service, currently set to `null`.

- **server**: 
  - Server details for the request, currently set to `null`.

- **rtmpUrl**: 
  - Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for video streaming, currently set to `null`.

- **streamKey**: 
  - Unique key for the streaming service, currently set to `null`.

- **channelUrl**: 
  - The URL of the channel where the video will be streamed, currently set to `null`.

- **authUsername**: 
  - Username for authentication on the provider, currently set to `null`.

- **authPassword**: 
  - Password for authentication on the provider, currently set to `null`.

- **uniqueKey**: 
  - A unique identifier for the event.

- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier of the video to be updated.

- **accountId**: 
  - Account identifier related to the event.

- **channelId**: 
  - Identifier of the channel where the event is hosted.

- **sessionId**:

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Event - Delete - Facebook Page

#### Request Method:
- **POST**: This endpoint requires a POST request to initiate the deletion of a video event associated with a Facebook Page.

#### URL:
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete**: This is the local server address where the API is hosted, followed by the specific path for deleting video events.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type**: This header specifies the type of content being sent in the request. Here, it is set to "application/json", indicating that the request body will contain JSON formatted data.

#### Request Body:
The body of the POST request consists of two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options:
- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the service provider being used to manage the video event. Here, it is set to "facebookPage".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider; currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: A key for authentication with the API; currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: A secret for further authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for connecting to the API; currently set to null.
- **authToken**: A token for authorizing the request; currently set to null.
- **server**: Information about the server being used; currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: Key for identifying the stream, currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel associated with the video; currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the specific video stream.
- **videoId**: The identifier of the video to be deleted.
- **accountId**: The ID of the account that the video is associated with.
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the video is hosted.
- **sessionId**: The ID of the session associated with the video event.
- **streamId**: The identifier for the stream linked to the event.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the requestor; currently set to null.
- **country**: The country where the event is taking place, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state where the event is taking place, set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video event, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video event, which is "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video event for categorization, which are "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details:
- **accountId**: Same as above, representing the account for the event.
- **sessionId**: Same as above, representing the session for the event.
- **channelId**: Same as above, representing the channel for the event.
- **videoId**: Same as above, representing the video for deletion.
- **title**: Same as above, representing the title of the event.
- **description**: Same as above, providing a description of the event.
- **tags**: Same as above, listing relevant tags for the event.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream; set to "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search being performed; set to "Game".
- **started**: A boolean to indicate if the event has started; set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event started, set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **paused**: A boolean indicating if the event is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event was paused; currently reflects the start time as it has not been paused.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the event has stopped; set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event stopped; currently set to null since it hasn't stopped.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream associated with the video event.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the video, here referred to as "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Category classification of the event; listed as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category; currently set to a placeholder value.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the event, marked as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category; currently set to a placeholder value.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled, which is "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; here it is set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the video event.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the service provider; currently set to empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting during the event; set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time to reset voting options, set to 5 (assumed to be minutes).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button; set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button; set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the event; set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled; set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button; set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button; set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name associated with the stream locator; set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the stream's assets; set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for the video on various platforms, with all entries currently set to false (indicating no identifiers are present).
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs from various platforms, with all entries currently set to false (indicating no event identifiers are present).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the event; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speakers; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: An array containing additional camera and microphone pairings.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created; set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created; set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated; set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated; set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted; currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted; currently set to null.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Create Video Event on Google Local

This endpoint is used to create a video event on Google Local. Below is a detailed description of each field in the request body.

#### options
- **providerName**: Name of the video service provider, in this case, it is set to "google".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, which may be used for specific internal processing or integrations.
- **apiKey**: Key used for authenticating requests to the provider’s API. Can be set to null if not applicable.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key used alongside the API key for secure communications.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for authentication. Indicates the application making the request.
- **authToken**: Token used for user authentication, can be required for certain API calls.
- **server**: Address of the server used for communication, can be set to null if not required.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for the Real-Time Messaging Protocol, used for streaming video.
- **streamKey**: Key used to authenticate a video stream.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel where the video will be hosted.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication on the provider’s service, can be set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password used for authentication, can be set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: Unique identifier for this specific video event. Required to differentiate it from others.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video itself. Used for tracking and retrieving the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user’s account associated with this event.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel on which the video is streamed.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session during which the video is streamed.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, used to manage video streams.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is sent. Can be set to null.
- **country**: The country in which the video event is hosted, default set to "United States".
- **state**: The state in which the video event is hosted, default set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video event, in this case, “Fortune's Basketball Challenge”.
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, describing it as a basketball game featuring exciting plays and challenges.
- **tags**: Comma-separated keywords relevant to the video for search and categorization, such as "basketball,game,challenge".

#### details
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user’s account, repeated for ease of access.
- **sessionId**: Session identifier for the event, repeated for ease of access.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, repeated for ease of access.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, repeated for ease of access.
- **title**: Title of the video event, reiterated for clarity.
- **description**: Description of the video, reiterated for clarity.
- **tags**: Tags for the video, reiterated for clarity.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream, set to "Live" indicating this is a live event.
- **searchType**: Type of search for indexing purposes, set to "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp showing when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp showing when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped, set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, set to null as it has not stopped yet.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, repeated for ease of access.
- **channel**: Name of the channel where the event is hosted, here it is “Fortune's Basketball Channel”.
- **category**: Category of the event, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, helps in organizing events.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the event, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, for organized classification.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled to occur.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is slated to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, indicating the visual representation of the video.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the video provider, set to blank in this instance.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available to participants.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time period for resetting votes, here set to 5 minutes.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available for the event, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1/2**: Text for the first and second vote buttons, representing options available to viewers (e.g., "Layup" and "Dunk").
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards for participants are enabled or not, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether tournament features are enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1/2**: Text for the buttons related to tournament features (e.g., "Hit" and "Miss").
- **streamLocatorName**: Custom name for the stream locator, provided here as "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset, designated as "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms indicating if specific video IDs are present for different streaming services (all set to false).
- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms indicating if specific event IDs are present for event tracking on various platforms (all set to false).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the event.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for audio capture.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker system used for sound output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects representing additional cameras and their corresponding microphones used during the event.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event information was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, here set to null as it has not been deleted.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, set to null since the event is still active. 

This detailed description provides users with an understanding of the fields required to create a video event on Google Local using the specified API endpoint.
