request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Google Local

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update the existing resource at the specified URL.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the endpoint where the video event details are sent for updating.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body
The request body is structured in two main sections: **options** and **details**.

##### Options
1. **providerName**: Specifies the name of the video service provider (e.g., Google).
2. **providerId**: Unique identifier for the provider (currently not specified).
3. **apiKey**: Key for authentication with the video service API (currently not specified).
4. **apiSecret**: Secret key for the API, used for securing communication (currently not provided).
5. **apiClientId**: Client ID for the API (currently not specified).
6. **authToken**: Token used for authenticating requests (currently not included).
7. **server**: The server to connect to (currently not specified).
8. **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for live streaming (currently not specified).
9. **streamKey**: Key needed for accessing the stream (currently not specified).
10. **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel (currently not specified).
11. **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently not specified).
12. **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently not specified).
13. **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
14. **videoId**: ID of the video being updated.
15. **accountId**: ID representing the user or account managing the video.
16. **channelId**: ID of the channel associated with the video.
17. **sessionId**: ID for the session during which the stream occurs.
18. **streamId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
19. **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made (currently not specified).
20. **country**: The country of the event, e.g., "United States".
21. **state**: The state of the event, e.g., "California".
22. **title**: The title of the video event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
23. **description**: A brief description of the video, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
24. **tags**: Keywords associated with the event, e.g., "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details
1. **accountId**: Same as in options, representing the user's account ID.
2. **sessionId**: Same as in options, indicating the unique session ID.
3. **channelId**: Same as in options, indicating the unique channel ID.
4. **videoId**: Same as in options, representing the identifier for the video.
5. **title**: The same title for the video event previously defined.
6. **description**: The same description provided for the event.
7. **tags**: Same tags as mentioned earlier.
8. **streamType**: Type of stream, e.g., "Live".
9. **searchType**: Type of search category, e.g., "Game".
10. **started**: Boolean indicating if the event has started (true/false).
11. **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event started.
12. **paused**: Boolean indicating if the event is paused (true/false).
13. **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event was paused.
14. **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the event has stopped (true/false).
15. **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event was stopped (currently not specified).
16. **streamId**: Same as in options, identifying the streaming session.
17. **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
18. **category**: Main category of the event, e.g., "Board".
19. **categoryId**: Identifier for the category (currently not specified).
20. **subCategory**: Detailed category for the event, e.g., "Outdoor Party".
21. **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory (currently not specified).
22. **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled, e.g., "2024-02-01".
23. **scheduleTime**: The time when the event is scheduled to start, e.g., "18:00:00".
24. **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, e.g., "1".
25. **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
26. **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the video service (currently not specified).
27. **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens available for voting during the event.
28. **votingTimeReset**: Time period in seconds for resetting voting opportunities.
29. **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available (e.g., 4).
30. **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, e.g., "Layup".
31. **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, e.g., "Dunk".
32. **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for participation (true/false).
33. **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is enabled (true/false).
34. **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, e.g., "Hit".
35. **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, e.g., "Miss".
36. **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
37. **streamAssetName**: Name identifying the stream asset.
38. **platformVideoIds**: Object containing output IDs for various platforms, indicating whether they are set (all false in this case).
39. **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for various social media platforms, indicating whether they are set (all false in this case).
40. **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
41. **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.
42. **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
43. **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
44. **createdDate**: The date when the event was created.
45. **createdTime**: The time when the event was created.
46. **updatedDate**: The date when the event was last updated.
47. **updatedTime**: The time when the event was last updated.
48. **deletedDate**: The date when the event was deleted (currently not specified).
49. **deletedTime**: The time when the event was deleted (currently not specified).

This structure provides a comprehensive view of the data being managed for video events, specifically for updates via this API endpoint.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description

#### Name: 
**Video - Event - Delete - Google Local**

#### Request
- **Method**: POST
  - The HTTP method used for this request. In this case, it indicates that new information is being submitted to the server to delete a video event.

- **URL**: 
  - `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`
  - This is the endpoint used to delete a video event from the local server.

- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header specifies that the content of the request is in JSON format.

#### Body
The body of the request consists of two main parts: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: `"google"`
  - Indicates that the video service provider is Google.
  
- **providerId**: `""`
  - An identifier related to the provider, likely to be filled in when available.

- **apiKey**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the API key required for authentication, if needed.

- **apiSecret**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the API secret, used for secure communication with the provider.

- **apiClientId**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the client identifier for API requests.

- **authToken**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the authentication token required for API calls.

- **server**: `null`
  - Placeholder for server information, if applicable.

- **rtmpUrl**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL for streaming, if used.

- **streamKey**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the stream key, which is typically used to authenticate streaming connections.

- **channelUrl**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the URL of the channel where the video is hosted.

- **authUsername**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the username required for authentication, if applicable.

- **authPassword**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the password required for authentication, if applicable.

- **uniqueKey**: `"uniqueKey"`
  - A unique identifier for the video event.

- **videoId**: `"videoId"`
  - The ID of the video that is being deleted.

- **accountId**: `"accountId"`
  - The ID of the account associated with this video event.

- **channelId**: `"channelId"`
  - The ID of the channel where the video event is hosted.

- **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
  - The session ID for tracking the specific video session.

- **streamId**: `"streamId"`
  - An identifier for the stream being dealt with.

- **ipAddress**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the IP address of the user making the request.

- **country**: `"United States"`
  - The country associated with the video event.

- **state**: `"California"`
  - The state associated with the video event.

- **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
  - The title of the video event.

- **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
  - A brief description of what the video event entails.

- **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
  - Comma-separated tags describing the content of the video.

##### Details
- **accountId**: `"accountId"`
  - The same account ID as listed in options, used to identify the owner of the event.

- **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
  - Same as the session ID in options, for tracking.

- **channelId**: `"channelId"`
  - The channel ID from options, showing where the video belongs.

- **videoId**: `"videoId"`
  - The ID of the video being deleted, same as in the options.

- **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
  - The title of the event, consistent with the one in the options.

- **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
  - Description of the video event.

- **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
  - Tags for easy categorization and searching of the video.

- **streamType**: `"Live"`
  - Indicates that the stream is live.

- **searchType**: `"Game"`
  - Categorization of the event type, in this case, a game.

- **started**: `true`
  - Indicates whether the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
  - Timestamp of when the video event started.

- **paused**: `false`
  - Indicates if the stream is currently paused.

- **pausedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
  - Timestamp of when the video was paused (if it was paused).

- **stopped**: `false`
  - Indicates whether the stream has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: `null`
  - Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (if applicable).

- **streamId**: `"streamId"`
  - The ID for the stream, consistent with the one in options.

- **channel**: `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`
  - Name of the channel associated with the video.

- **category**: `"Board"`
  - The category classification for the event.

- **categoryId**: `"categoryId"`
  - Unique identifier for the category.

- **subCategory**: `"Outdoor Party"`
  - Sub-category for further classification of the event.

- **subCategoryId**: `"subCategoryId"`
  - Unique identifier for the sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: `"2024-02-01"`
  - Scheduled date for the video event.

- **scheduleTime**: `"18:00:00"`
  - Scheduled time for the event.

- **streamHours**: `1`
  - The duration of the video stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`
  - URL for the cover photo representing the video event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
  - URL for playback provided by the streaming service, if available.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`
  - Quantity of tokens available for voting during the event.

- **votingTimeReset**: `"5"`
  - Amount of time (likely in seconds) before the voting time resets.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`
  - Number of buttons available for users to cast votes during the event.

- **voteButtonText1**: `"Layup"`
  - Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: `"Dunk"`
  - Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`
  - Indicates if rewards for participation are enabled.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`
  - Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: `"Hit"`
  - Text for the first button related to the tournament feature.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: `"Miss"`
  - Text for the second button related to the tournament feature.

- **streamLocatorName**: `"basketball-locator-name"`
  - Name assigned for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: `"basketball-asset-name"`
  - Name of the stream asset.

- **platformVideoIds**: (Object containing various platform IDs)
  - Placeholder fields to store output IDs from multiple platforms, all set to `false`, indicating no IDs are assigned.

- **platformEventIds**: (Object containing various event IDs)
  - Placeholder fields for storing event IDs across social media platforms and event managers, all initialized to `false`.

- **primaryCameraName**: `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`
  - Name of the primary camera used for the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`
  - Name of the primary microphone used during the event.

- **primarySpeakerName**: `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`
  - Name of the primary speaker used for sound output in the event.

- **additionalCameras**: 
  - List containing details of additional cameras and their associated microphones.
    - Example: 
      - Camera: "camera-2" with Microphone: "mic-2"
      - Camera: "camera-3" with Microphone: "mic-3"

- **createdDate**: `"2024-02-18"`
  - The date when the video event was created.

- **createdTime**: `"14:54:25"`
  - The time when the video event was created.

- **updatedDate**: `"2024-02-24"`
  - The date when the video event was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `"23:29:19"`
  - The time when the video event was last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the date of deletion if applicable.

- **deletedTime**: `null`
  - Placeholder for the time of deletion if applicable.

### Description of the API Endpoint: Video - Event - Create - LinkedIn

#### Request Method
- **Method**: POST
  - This endpoint uses the HTTP POST method to create a new video event.

#### Request URL
- **URL**: http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create
  - The API endpoint URL where the request is made. This is a local server URL.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: application/json
  - This header indicates that the body of the request contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
The body of the request is structured in two main parts: `options` and `details`.

**Options:**
- **providerName**: linkedin
  - The name of the platform where the video is to be streamed.
  
- **providerId**: (string)
  - An identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
  
- **apiKey**: null
  - The API key used for authentication, currently not provided.
  
- **apiSecret**: null
  - The secret key for API access, currently not provided.
  
- **apiClientId**: null
  - The client ID for the API, currently not provided.
  
- **authToken**: null
  - The authentication token required to access the service, currently not provided.
  
- **server**: null
  - The server address, currently not specified.
  
- **rtmpUrl**: null
  - The URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently not defined.
  
- **streamKey**: null
  - The key required to stream the video, currently not provided.
  
- **channelUrl**: null
  - The URL of the channel where the video will be streamed, currently not specified.
  
- **authUsername**: null
  - The username for authentication purposes, currently not provided.
  
- **authPassword**: null
  - The password for authentication purposes, currently not provided.
  
- **uniqueKey**: uniqueKey
  - A unique identifier for this video event.
  
- **videoId**: videoId
  - The identifier for the video being created.
  
- **accountId**: accountId
  - The identifier for the account associated with the video.
  
- **channelId**: channelId
  - The identifier for the channel where the video will be streamed.
  
- **sessionId**: sessionId
  - The identifier for the session of the video event.
  
- **streamId**: streamId
  - The identifier for the stream of the event.
  
- **ipAddress**: null
  - The IP address from which the request is being made, currently not provided.
  
- **country**: United States
  - The country where the event is taking place.
  
- **state**: California
  - The state where the event is taking place.
  
- **title**: Fortune's Basketball Challenge
  - The title of the video event.
  
- **description**: Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.
  - A brief description of what the video event depicts.
  
- **tags**: basketball,game,challenge
  - Tags associated with the video to categorize or describe it.

**Details:**
- **accountId**: accountId
  - Identifier for the associated account.
  
- **sessionId**: sessionId
  - Identifier for the session of the event.
  
- **channelId**: channelId
  - Identifier for the channel in which the event is happening.

  - Identifier for the video being created.

  - Title of the video event.
  
- **description**: Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.
  - Description of the event.
  
- **tags**: basketball,game,challenge
  - Associated tags for the event.
  
- **streamType**: Live
  - Type of the stream, indicating it is a live event.
  
- **searchType**: Game
  - Specifies the type of content being searched, in this case, a game.
  
- **started**: true

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - LinkedIn

**Request Method:** PUT  
**URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`  
**Headers:**
- **Content-Type:** Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

---

#### Request Body Details:

**Options Object:**
- **providerName:** The name of the video service provider; in this case, it's "linkedin".
- **providerId:** An identifier for the provider, left empty here.
- **apiKey:** The API key for authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiSecret:** The secret key for the API; currently not provided.
- **apiClientId:** The client ID for API access; currently not provided.
- **authToken:** The authentication token for accessing the API; currently set to null.
- **server:** The server information; currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl:** URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; currently not provided.
- **streamKey:** A key used to authenticate the stream; currently not provided.
- **channelUrl:** URL for the video channel; currently not provided.
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication; currently set to null.
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication; currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey:** A unique identifier for the video event; assigned the value "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** The identifier for the video being updated; labeled as "videoId".
- **accountId:** Identifier for the associated account; labeled as "accountId".
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel; labeled as "channelId".
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session; labeled as "sessionId".
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream; labeled as "streamId".
- **ipAddress:** The IP address; set to null.
- **country:** The country where the event is located, set to "United States".
- **state:** The state where the event is located, set to "California".
- **title:** Title of the event, in this case, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** A brief description of the event: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags:** Comma-separated tags related to the event, includes "basketball, game, challenge".

---

**Details Object:**
- **accountId:** Identifier for the associated account; same as above.
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session; same as above.
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel; same as above.
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video being updated; same as above.
- **title:** Title of the event, again "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** Description of the event; same as above.
- **tags:** Comma-separated tags related to the event; same as above.
- **streamType:** This indicates that the stream is of type "Live".
- **searchType:** Indicates the search type for the event, set as "Game".
- **started:** Boolean indicating if the event has started; currently set to true.
- **startedOn:** Timestamp when the event started; "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **paused:** Boolean indicating if the event is paused; currently set to false.
- **pausedOn:** Timestamp indicating when the event was paused; "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **stopped:** Indicates if the event has stopped; currently false.
- **stoppedOn:** Timestamp for when the event stopped; currently set to null.
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream; same as above.
- **channel:** Name of the channel streaming the event; "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category:** Category of the event; "Board".
- **categoryId:** Identifier for the category; labeled as "categoryId".
- **subCategory:** Sub-category of the event; "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the sub-category; labeled as "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the event is scheduled; "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime:** Time when the event is scheduled; "18:00:00".
- **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours; currently set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the event's cover photo; "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider; currently left empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** Quantity of tokens for voting; set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset:** A string setting the time for voting reset; set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of buttons for voting; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first voting button; "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second voting button; "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Indicates if rewards are enabled; currently set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Indicates if tournament features are enabled; currently set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button; "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button; "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName:** Name for stream locator; "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName:** Name of the stream asset; "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds:** A dictionary for video IDs on various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds:** A dictionary for event IDs on various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera used; "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone used; "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker used; "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras:** List of additional cameras and microphones; contains two entries with camera and mic identifiers.
- **createdDate:** Date when the event was created; "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime:** Time when the event was created; "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate:** Date when the event was last updated; "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime:** Time when the event was last updated; "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate:** Date when the event was deleted; currently set to null.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the event was deleted; currently set to null.

request.description:
{"description": "This API endpoint deletes a video event on LinkedIn. Below is a detailed description of each field in the data:

1. **options**: This section contains various parameters related to the video event.
   - **providerName**: The name of the service provider, in this case, it's 'linkedin'.
   - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, which is optional and currently empty.
   - **apiKey**: The API key for authorization; currently set to null.
   - **apiSecret**: The API secret for authorization; currently set to null.
   - **apiClientId**: The client ID for API access; currently set to null.
   - **authToken**: The authentication token needed; currently set to null.
   - **server**: Refers to the server information; currently set to null.
   - **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming; currently set to null.
   - **streamKey**: The stream key used for the event; currently set to null.
   - **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel where the stream is hosted; currently set to null.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently set to null.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently set to null.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
   - **videoId**: The identifier for the video to be deleted.
   - **accountId**: The account identifier associated with the video event.
   - **channelId**: The identifier for the channel, where this event is being streamed.
   - **sessionId**: The session identifier for the video event.
   - **streamId**: The identifier for the stream.
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address associated with the event; currently set to null.
   - **country**: Geographic country where the event is being streamed; set to 'United States'.
   - **state**: Geographic state of the event; set to 'California'.
   - **title**: The title of the video event.
   - **description**: A brief description of the video content.
   - **tags**: Comma-separated keywords related to the video event.

2. **details**: This section provides detailed information about the video event itself.
   - **accountId**: The account identifier associated with the video event.
   - **sessionId**: The session identifier for the event.
   - **channelId**: The identifier for the channel related to the video.
   - **videoId**: The identifier for the specific video event.
   - **title**: The title of the video event.
   - **description**: Detailed description of the video.
   - **tags**: Tags associated with the video event.
   - **streamType**: Indicates whether the stream is Live or recorded.
   - **searchType**: The type of content that has been streamed; in this case, it’s categorized as 'Game'.
   - **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
   - **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped; currently null indicating it hasn't been stopped.
   - **streamId**: The stream identifier.
   - **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the video event.
   - **category**: The category of the event; set to 'Board'.
   - **categoryId**: The identifier for the event category.
   - **subCategory**: More specific category of the video; set to 'Outdoor Party'.
   - **subCategoryId**: The identifier for the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: The date when the video event is scheduled to take place.
   - **scheduleTime**: The time when the event is scheduled to occur.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo associated with the video event.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently set to empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of votes allowed; set to 100.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time duration for resetting the voting; set to 5.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of available vote buttons; set to 4.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button.
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled; set to false.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if the event includes a tournament; set to true.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName**: The name used to identify the stream locator.
   - **streamAssetName**: The name of the asset related to the stream.
   - **platformVideoIds**: A collection of IDs for various platforms indicating if the video event is associated with them, all currently set to false.
   - **platformEventIds**: A collection of IDs for events on various platforms, all currently set to false.
   - **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the event.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used for the event.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker system used for the event.
   - **additionalCameras**: An array of objects representing additional cameras and microphones used for the event.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the video event was created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the video event was created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the video event was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the video event was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: The date when the video event was deleted; currently null indicating it hasn't been deleted.
   - **deletedTime**: The time when the video event was deleted; currently null indicating it hasn't been deleted."}

request.description:
**Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Create - Meetup**

This endpoint is used to create a video event on the Meetup platform. Here are the details of the request body containing options and details:

### Request Body

#### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the provider where the event will be created (example: 'meetup').
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider (leave empty if not applicable).
- **apiKey**: The API key needed to authenticate with the provider (if required, otherwise leave as null).
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for additional authentication (if applicable).
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API (leave null if not required).
- **authToken**: The authentication token for the service (leave null if not used).
- **server**: The server address (leave null if not applicable).
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL used for streaming (leave null if not required).
- **streamKey**: The key used to identify the stream (leave null if not needed).
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel where the event will be streamed (leave null if not needed).
- **authUsername**: The username for authentication, if required (leave null if not used).
- **authPassword**: The password for authentication, if required (leave null if not used).
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key to identify the event (example: 'uniqueKey').
- **videoId**: The ID assigned to the video (example: 'videoId').
- **accountId**: The account ID related to the provider (example: 'accountId').
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the event will be created (example: 'channelId').
- **sessionId**: The session ID for the video event (example: 'sessionId').
- **streamId**: The ID for the stream associated with the event (example: 'streamId').
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user creating the event (leave null if not applicable).
- **country**: The country where the event is taking place (default is 'United States').
- **state**: The state where the event is occurring (default is 'California').
- **title**: The title of the video event (example: 'Fortune's Basketball Challenge').
- **description**: A brief description of the event (example: 'Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.').
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags related to the event (example: 'basketball,game,challenge').

#### Details
- **accountId**: The account identifier for routing the video event correctly (example: 'accountId').
- **sessionId**: The ID of the session related to the event (example: 'sessionId').
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel hosting the event (example: 'channelId').
- **videoId**: A unique identifier for the video (example: 'videoId').
- **title**: The title of the event (example: 'Fortune's Basketball Challenge').
- **description**: A detailed description of the video event (example: 'Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.').
- **tags**: Tags that categorize the event (example: 'basketball,game,challenge').
- **streamType**: The type of streaming (example: 'Live').
- **searchType**: The type of event for search purposes (example: 'Game').
- **started**: A boolean indicating whether the stream has started (true or false).
- **startedOn**: The timestamp indicating when the event started (example: '2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z').
- **paused**: A boolean indicating whether the stream is paused (true or false).
- **pausedOn**: The timestamp indicating when the event was paused (example: '2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z').
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating whether the stream has stopped (true or false).
- **stoppedOn**: The timestamp indicating when the event was stopped (leave null if not applicable).
- **streamId**: The unique ID for the video stream (example: 'streamId').
- **channel**: The name of the channel where the event is hosted (example: 'Fortune's Basketball Channel').
- **category**: The general category of the event (example: 'Board').
- **categoryId**: The ID corresponding to the event category (example: 'categoryId').
- **subCategory**: A more specific sub-category for the event (example: 'Outdoor Party').
- **subCategoryId**: The ID for the sub-category (example: 'subCategoryId').
- **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled (example: '2024-02-01').
- **scheduleTime**: The time when the event is scheduled to start (example: '18:00:00').
- **streamHours**: The estimated duration of the stream in hours (example: 1).
- **coverPhotoUrl**: A URL pointing to the cover photo for the event (example: 'basketball-cover-url.jpg').
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL for playback provided by the hosting service (leave empty if not applicable).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of tokens available for voting (example: 100).
- **votingTimeReset**: The reset time for voting in seconds (example: '5').
- **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of voting options available (example: 4).
- **voteButtonText1**: The text for the first voting button (example: 'Layup').
- **voteButtonText2**: The text for the second voting button (example: 'Dunk').
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the event (true or false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is enabled for the event (true or false).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: The text for the first button in the tournament feature (example: 'Hit').
- **tournamentButtonText2**: The text for the second button in the tournament feature (example: 'Miss').
- **streamLocatorName**: A name assigned for locating the stream (example: 'basketball-locator-name').
- **streamAssetName**: A name assigned to the assets used in the stream (example: 'basketball-asset-name').
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing flags indicating if video IDs for various platforms (like YouTube, Twitch, etc.) are available (all fields have false as default).
- **platformEventIds**: An object containing flags indicating if event IDs for various platforms (like Facebook, Twitter, etc.) are available (all fields have false as default).
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for streaming (example: 'Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam').
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used for audio (example: 'WirelessAudioTek Device').
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker system used (example: 'Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0').
- **additionalCameras**: An array of objects describing additional cameras and their corresponding microphones used for streaming.
- **createdDate**: The date when the event was created (example: '2024-02-18').
- **createdTime**: The time when the event was created (example: '14:54:25').
- **updatedDate**: The date when the event was last updated (example: '2024-02-24').
- **updatedTime**: The time when the event was last updated (example: '23:29:19').
- **deletedDate**: The date when the event was deleted (leave null if not applicable).
- **deletedTime**: The time when the event was deleted (leave null if not applicable).

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Meetup

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update an existing resource in the server. In this case, it updates the details of a video event.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the local endpoint that processes the request to update video event information.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: The format of the data being sent in the request body. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body will contain JSON data.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`. 

##### Options
1. **providerName**: Specifies the name of the video streaming service provider. In this case, it is set to "meetup".
2. **providerId**: Unique identifier for the video provider; currently left empty.
3. **apiKey**: API key for authentication with the provider; currently set to null, meaning not used.
4. **apiSecret**: Secret key for secure access to the provider; currently null.
5. **apiClientId**: Client identifier for API access; currently null.
6. **authToken**: Token used for authenticating requests; currently null.
7. **server**: Represents the server address; currently null.
8. **rtmpUrl**: The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming; currently null.
9. **streamKey**: Key used to connect to the streaming service; currently null.
10. **channelUrl**: URL for the channel; currently null.
11. **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently null.
12. **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently null.
13. **uniqueKey**: A distinctive key for identifying this video event, set to "uniqueKey".
14. **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed; currently set to "videoId".
15. **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the video; currently set to "accountId".
16. **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; currently set to "channelId".
17. **sessionId**: Identifier for the specific session of the video; currently set to "sessionId".
18. **streamId**: Identifier for the streaming session; currently set to "streamId".
19. **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user; currently null.
20. **country**: The country of the event, set to "United States".
21. **state**: The state of the event, set to "California".
22. **title**: The title of the video, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
23. **description**: A brief description of the event, "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
24. **tags**: Comma-separated keywords related to the video, here set to "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details
1. **accountId**: Same as above; identifies the account for the event.
2. **sessionId**: Same as above; identifies the session for the event.
3. **channelId**: Same as above; identifies the channel.
4. **videoId**: Same as above; identifies the video for the event.
5. **title**: Same title as above for the video.
6. **description**: Same description as above for the video.
7. **tags**: Same tags as above for the video.
8. **streamType**: Indicates the type of the stream. Here, it is "Live".
9. **searchType**: The category of the search for the event; marked as "Game".
10. **started**: A boolean indicating if the event has started; currently set to true.
11. **startedOn**: Timestamp showing when the event started.
12. **paused**: A boolean indicating if the event is currently paused; currently set to false.
13. **pausedOn**: Timestamp showing when the event was paused; currently set.
14. **stopped**: Indicates if the event has ended; currently set to false.
15. **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the event was stopped; currently null, indicating it hasn't stopped.
16. **streamId**: Same as above; identifies the stream for the event.
17. **channel**: The name of the channel, "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
18. **category**: The category of the video; set to "Board".
19. **categoryId**: Identifier for the category; currently set to "categoryId".
20. **subCategory**: Subcategory of the event, here set to "Outdoor Party".
21. **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory; currently set to "subCategoryId".
22. **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled; set to "2024-02-01".
23. **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled to occur; set to "18:00:00".
24. **streamHours**: Duration of the live stream in hours; currently set to 1 hour.
25. **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo for the event; currently set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
26. **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback via the provider; currently left empty.
27. **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting; currently set to 100.
28. **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds to reset voting; currently set to "5".
29. **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available; currently set to 4.
30. **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button; set to "Layup".
31. **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button; set to "Dunk".
32. **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are available; currently set to false.
33. **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled; currently set to true.
34. **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button; set to "Hit".
35. **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button; set to "Miss".
36. **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator; currently set to "basketball-locator-name".
37. **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset; currently set to "basketball-asset-name".
38. **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for various platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch). All are currently set to false, indicating no identifiers.
39. **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for various event platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram). All are currently set to false, indicating no identifiers.
40. **primaryCameraName**: The primary camera used for the stream; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
41. **primaryMicrophoneName**: The microphone used for the primary audio; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
42. **primarySpeakerName**: The speaker used for audio output; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
43. **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and their associated microphones. Here, it includes two additional camera-microphone pairs.
44. **createdDate**: Date when the video event was created; set to "2024-02-18".
45. **createdTime**: Time when the video event was created; set to "14:54:25".
46. **updatedDate**: Date when the video event was last updated; set to "2024-02-24".
47. **updatedTime**: Time when the video event was last updated; set to "23:29:19".
48. **deletedDate**: Date when the video event was deleted; currently null, indicating it hasn't been deleted.
49. **deletedTime**: Time when the video event was deleted; currently null.

This detailed breakdown provides clarity on the structure and purpose of each data point in the request body used to update a video event.

### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Delete - Meetup

**Method:** POST  
**URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type:** Specifies the media type of the resource. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body
The request body consists of two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName:** The name of the video streaming provider, in this case, it is set to "meetup".
- **providerId:** A unique identifier for the provider. Currently left empty.
- **apiKey:** API key for authentication. Currently null.
- **apiSecret:** API secret for authentication. Currently null.
- **apiClientId:** Client ID for the API. Currently null.
- **authToken:** Token for authorization. Currently null.
- **server:** Server designation. Currently null.
- **rtmpUrl:** Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL. Currently null.
- **streamKey:** Key for the stream. Currently null.
- **channelUrl:** URL for the channel. Currently null.
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication. Currently null.
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication. Currently null.
- **uniqueKey:** A unique identifier for the event. This is set as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** The ID corresponding to the video being deleted. Currently set as "videoId".
- **accountId:** The ID of the account associated with the event. Currently set as "accountId".
- **channelId:** The ID of the channel associated with the event. Currently set as "channelId".
- **sessionId:** The ID of the session associated with the event. Currently set as "sessionId".
- **streamId:** The ID of the stream associated with the event. Currently set as "streamId".
- **ipAddress:** The IP address of the client. Currently null.
- **country:** The country where the event is being conducted. Set as "United States".
- **state:** The state within the country. Set as "California".
- **title:** The title of the event. Set as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** A brief description of the event. It mentions amazing plays and challenges in basketball.
- **tags:** Comma-separated tags relevant to the event, such as basketball, game, and challenge.

##### Details
- **accountId:** The same account ID used in the options, confirming the association with the account.
- **sessionId:** The same session ID used in the options, confirms the session.
- **channelId:** The same channel ID as in the options.
- **videoId:** The same video ID as in the options.
- **title:** Title of the event, consistent with that in the `options` section.
- **description:** The same description as in the `options`.
- **tags:** Same tags as in the `options`.
- **streamType:** Indicates the type of stream; here it is "Live".
- **searchType:** Type of content for categorization; described here as "Game".
- **started:** A boolean flag indicating if the stream has started. Set to true.
- **startedOn:** The start date and time of the stream in ISO 8601 format.
- **paused:** A boolean flag indicating if the stream is paused. Set to false.
- **pausedOn:** Date and time in ISO 8601 format when the stream was last paused.
- **stopped:** A boolean flag indicating if the stream is stopped. Set to false.
- **stoppedOn:** Date and time when the stream was stopped. Currently null.
- **streamId:** The stream ID corresponding to the event. Set as "streamId".
- **channel:** The name of the channel conducting the event, here labeled "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category:** Category of the event; set as "Board".
- **categoryId:** Unique identifier for the category, currently set as "categoryId".
- **subCategory:** Subcategory within the main category; set as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId:** Unique identifier for the subcategory, currently set as "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the event is scheduled. Set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime:** Time of day when the event is set to begin. Here it is "18:00:00".
- **streamHours:** Total hours allocated for the stream. Set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL of the cover photo associated with the event; set as "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider; currently left empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** The quantity of tokens available for voting during the event. Set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset:** Amount of time to reset the voting, set as "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1:** Label for the first vote button; set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2:** Label for the second vote button; set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Flag to indicate if rewards are enabled; currently set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Flag indicating if tournament features are enabled; set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button; set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button; set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName:** Name for locating the stream; set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName:** Name for the asset associated with the stream; set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds:** A collection of output IDs for various platforms; all currently set to false, indicating no associated output IDs.
- **platformEventIds:** A collection of event IDs for various platforms; all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName:** The main camera used for streaming; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** The main microphone used for the audio capture; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName:** The primary speaker used for audio output; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras:** An array describing additional cameras and microphones used during the event. Lists camera-microphone pairs.
- **createdDate:** Date on which the event details were created; set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime:** Time at which the event details were created; set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate:** Date on which the event details were last updated; set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime:** Time at which the updates were made; set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate:** Date when the event was deleted; currently null.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the event was deleted; currently null.

This detailed description aims to assist the users in understanding the required request structure and the parameters involved when making a deletion request for a video event associated with Meetup.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Create - YouTube

This API endpoint is used to create a video event for streaming on YouTube. It accepts a POST request containing various parameters that configure the event settings and details.

#### Request Details
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`
- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body Structure

The request body consists of two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options Section
- **providerName**: Identifies the video provider, in this case, "youtube".
- **providerId**: The specific ID assigned to the provider (currently empty).
- **apiKey**: The API key required for authenticating with the provider (currently null).
- **apiSecret**: The API secret required for secure communication (currently null).
- **apiClientId**: The client ID used for authenticating API requests (currently null).
- **authToken**: Token for authorizing API requests (currently null).
- **server**: Server settings related to streaming (currently null).
- **rtmpUrl**: The URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (currently null).
- **streamKey**: The key used to authenticate the stream (currently null).
- **channelUrl**: URL of the YouTube channel (currently null).
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently null).
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently null).
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the specific channel being used.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user (currently null).
- **country**: Country linked to the event (default is "United States").
- **state**: State linked to the event (default is "California").
- **title**: Title of the video event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: Brief description of the video event.
- **tags**: Comma-separated keywords related to the event (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

##### Details Section
- **accountId**: Reiterates the user account identifier.
- **sessionId**: Reiterates the session identifier.
- **channelId**: Reiterates the channel identifier.
- **videoId**: Reiterates the video identifier.
- **title**: Title of the event.
- **description**: A summary of the event.
- **tags**: Relevant keywords for discovery.
- **streamType**: Indicates that this is a "Live" stream.
- **searchType**: Describes the content type, here marked as "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started (true/false).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused (true/false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped (true/false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream stopped (if applicable).
- **streamId**: Reiterates the stream identifier.
- **channel**: Specifies the channel name (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
- **category**: General category of the event (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the specified category.
- **subCategory**: Detailed category of the event (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled (e.g., "2024-02-01").
- **scheduleTime**: The specific time when the event is to occur (e.g., "18:00:00").
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours (set to 1).
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover image associated with the event (e.g., "basketball-cover-url.jpg").
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback by the provider (currently empty).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens allowed for polling during the event.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration (in minutes) for resetting votes.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Count of voting buttons available during the event (set to 4).
- **voteButtonText1 / 2**: Text for the first and second voting buttons (e.g., "Layup" and "Dunk").
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled (false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament is enabled (true).
- **tournamentButtonText1 / 2**: Text for tournament voting buttons.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream (e.g., "basketball-locator-name").
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset related to the stream (e.g., "basketball-asset-name").
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for video outputs across various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for events on different platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream (e.g., "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam").
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for audio capture (e.g., "WirelessAudioTek Device").
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker device (e.g., "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0").
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional camera and microphone setups used in the event.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date of the last update made to the event.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update made to the event.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted (currently null).
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted (currently null).

This endpoint provides a comprehensive setup to create a video event for streaming, ensuring all necessary configurations for a successful broadcast are included.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - YouTube

#### Request Method
- **Method:** PUT
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`
- **Headers:**
  - **Content-Type**: Application/json is set to specify the type of data being sent.

#### Request Body
The request body is structured in two main sections: **options** and **details**.

**Options:**
- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the video service provider, in this case, 'youtube'.
- **providerId**: Unique identifier for the provider. This should be empty unless specified.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authenticating with the provider's services. Can be null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for additional API security, optional.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for OAuth purposes, also optional.
- **authToken**: Authentication token for secured requests, set to null if not used.
- **server**: Server address if required, null by default.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; can be left null.
- **streamKey**: A unique key for the stream, set to null if not applicable.
- **channelUrl**: URL linking to the video channel; can be null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, if needed.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; both username and password can be null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key assigned to the video event.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the specific video being updated.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the video is located.
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the user session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream being updated.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user; can remain null.
- **country**: The country where the event is taking place (default is 'United States').
- **state**: The state associated with the event (default is 'California').
- **title**: Title of the video event, in this case, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the event, which highlights the features of the game.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video for search optimization, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

**Details:**
- **accountId**: Same as in options, the account identifier.
- **sessionId**: Identifies the active session of the user.
- **channelId**: Identifies the channel on which the video is published.
- **videoId**: Unique identifier for the specific video being updated.
- **title**: Reiterates the title of the event.
- **description**: Reiterates the description of the event.
- **tags**: Reiterates the associated keywords for search.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream (e.g., 'Live').
- **searchType**: Category under which the event is listed, set as 'Game'.
- **started**: Indicates if the event has started (true/false).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the event is paused (true/false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the event is stopped (true/false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the event was stopped, can be null if ongoing.
- **streamId**: Identifier associated with the stream.
- **channel**: The name of the channel for the event, "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Category under which the video falls, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for this category.
- **subCategory**: More specific category, "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for this subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled, formatted as 'HH:MM:SS'.
- **streamHours**: Length of the stream in hours (set to 1 hour).
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, left empty if not applicable.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Total quantity of tokens for voting during the event.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration (in minutes) for vote reset timing.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of buttons available for voting during the stream.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for participants (true/false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are part of the event (true/false).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Label for the first button in tournament settings, "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Label for the second button in tournament settings, "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: A collection of identifiers for various video platforms; all set to false unless specified.
- **platformEventIds**: A collection of identifiers for various event platforms; all set to false unless specified.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used in the stream, "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone, "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker, "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects listing additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date the event was created.
- **createdTime**: Time the event was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date the event was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time the event was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date the event was deleted, null if not applicable.
- **deletedTime**: Time the event was deleted, null if not applicable.

request.description:
### Description of Data in the Endpoint: Video - Event - Delete - YouTube

- **name**: This specifies the name of the API request. In this case, it refers to a delete operation for a video event on YouTube.

- **request.method**: Indicates the HTTP method used for the request, which is POST. This is typically used for sending data to be processed.

- **request.url**: The URL endpoint where the POST request is directed, which is located on a local server for deleting a video event.

- **request.headers**: Contains key-value pairs of HTTP headers. Here, it specifies the content type as `application/json`, indicating that the request body will be in JSON format.

- **request.body.mode**: Describes the mode of the body used in the request. Here, it is set to "raw," meaning the data is sent as raw text.

- **request.body.raw**: This contains the actual JSON payload being sent with the request that includes both "options" and "details" objects.

#### Options Object
- **providerName**: Specifies the name of the provider, which is "youtube" in this case.
  
- **providerId**: This field is empty and is intended to hold the unique identifier for the provider.

- **apiKey**: A placeholder for an API key, which is currently set to null.

- **apiSecret**: A placeholder for the API secret, which is also currently null.

- **apiClientId**: A placeholder for the client ID needed for authentication, currently null.

- **authToken**: Represents the authentication token needed for API access, currently null.

- **server**: Placeholder indicating which server to connect to, currently null.

- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP), applicable for streaming, currently null.

- **streamKey**: A key used to identify a stream, currently null.

- **channelUrl**: URL to the channel, which is currently null.

- **authUsername**: Placeholder for the username needed for authentication, currently null.

- **authPassword**: Placeholder for the password for authentication, currently null.

- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event, currently set as "uniqueKey".

- **videoId**: The ID of the video to be deleted, currently set as "videoId".

- **accountId**: Identifies the account associated with the video, currently set as "accountId".

- **channelId**: Identifies the channel associated with the video, currently set as "channelId".

- **sessionId**: Represents the session ID linked to the request, currently set as "sessionId".

- **streamId**: The ID for the streaming session, currently set as "streamId".

- **ipAddress**: Placeholder for the IP address from which the request originates, currently null.

- **country**: Denotes the country associated with the request, set to "United States".

- **state**: Specifies the state associated with the request, set to "California".

- **title**: The title of the video event, set as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".

- **description**: A brief description of the video, indicating it features various plays and challenges in basketball.

- **tags**: Tags associated with the video to help categorize it, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Details Object
- **accountId**: The identifier for the account linked to the video event, same as in options.

- **sessionId**: The session identifier linked to the video, same as in options.

- **channelId**: The channel's identifier for the video, same as in options.

- **videoId**: The unique identifier for the video, same as in options.

- **title**: The title of the video event, repeating the value from options.

- **description**: Provides the same description as in options, detailing the video content.

- **tags**: Includes the same tags from the options, helping categorize the video.

- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream as "Live".

- **searchType**: Specifies the type of content for search filtering, listed as "Game".

- **started**: A boolean indicating whether the video stream has started, marked as true.

- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started, set to a specific date in ISO format.

- **paused**: A boolean indicating whether the stream is currently paused, marked as false.

- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused, indicating it hasn't been paused yet.

- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped, marked as false.

- **stoppedOn**: Placeholder timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, currently null.

- **streamId**: Repeating the stream identifier as in options.

- **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the video, which is "Fortune's Basketball Channel".

- **category**: The category of the content, described as "Board".

- **categoryId**: Identifier for the specified category, currently set as "categoryId".

- **subCategory**: Describes a finer classification within the category, listed as "Outdoor Party".

- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, currently set as "subCategoryId".

- **scheduleDate**: The date on which the stream is scheduled to occur, set to "2024-02-01".

- **scheduleTime**: The time scheduled for the stream to start, set at "18:00:00".

- **streamHours**: Indicates the duration of the stream, marked as 1 hour.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL link to the cover photo for the video, set as "basketball-cover-url.jpg".

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Placeholder for the playback URL from the provider, currently empty.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: Indicates the quantity of vote tokens available for the stream, set to 100.

- **votingTimeReset**: This represents the time duration to reset votes, set to "5".

- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available for audience participation, set to 4.

- **voteButtonText1**: The label for the first vote button, which is "Layup".

- **voteButtonText2**: The label for the second vote button, which is "Dunk".

- **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating whether rewards are enabled for participants, marked as false.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean that shows if tournaments are enabled, marked as true.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: Label for the first tournament action button, marked as "Hit".

- **tournamentButtonText2**: Label for the second tournament action button, marked as "Miss".

- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream, set as "basketball-locator-name".

- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the stream asset, set as "basketball-asset-name".

- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding identifiers for various platforms; all are set to false, indicating no output IDs are currently captured.

- **platformEventIds**: Object holding identifiers for various platforms' events; all set to false, indicating no associated events currently.

- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for the stream, specified as "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for audio capture, specified as "WirelessAudioTek Device".

- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speaker used for sound output, specified as "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".

- **additionalCameras**: Array containing objects for additional cameras and microphones with their respective names.

- **createdDate**: Date when the video event was created, specified as "2024-02-18".

- **createdTime**: Time when the video event was created, specified as "14:54:25".

- **updatedDate**: Date of the last update to the video event, specified as "2024-02-24".

- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update to the video event, specified as "23:29:19".

- **deletedDate**: Placeholder for the date when the video event was deleted, currently null.

- **deletedTime**: Placeholder for the time when the video event was deleted, currently null.

request.description:
```plaintext
This endpoint is used to update video event details specifically for Discord. Below is a detailed description of the data included in the request body:

1. **options**: Contains configuration settings for the video event.
   - **providerName**: Indicates the name of the provider (e.g., Discord).
   - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, usually left blank.
   - **apiKey**: The API key used for authentication with the provider; can be null if not required.
   - **apiSecret**: The secret key for API authentication; can be null.
   - **apiClientId**: The client ID used when authenticating with OAuth; can be null.
   - **authToken**: A token that may be needed for authentication; can be null.
   - **server**: Information about the server where the event is hosted; can be null. 
   - **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming; can be null.
   - **streamKey**: The stream key used for the event; can be null.
   - **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel for streaming on Discord; can be null.
   - **authUsername**: The username used for authentication; can be null.
   - **authPassword**: The password used for authentication; can be null.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique key for identifying the event; required.
   - **videoId**: The ID of the video; required.
   - **accountId**: The ID associated with the user’s account; required.
   - **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the event is taking place; required.
   - **sessionId**: The unique identifier for the session; required.
   - **streamId**: The ID of the stream; required.
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user; can be null.
   - **country**: The country where the event is taking place (default is "United States").
   - **state**: The state where the event is happening (default is "California").
   - **title**: The title of the video event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: A brief description of the event (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: Tags associated with the event for better discoverability (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **details**: Provides detailed information about the event.
   - **accountId**: Repeats the user's account ID.
   - **sessionId**: Repeats the session ID.
   - **channelId**: Repeats the channel ID.
   - **videoId**: Repeats the video ID.
   - **title**: Repeats the title of the event.
   - **description**: Repeats the description of the event.
   - **tags**: Repeats the tags for the event.
   - **streamType**: Specifies the type of stream (e.g., "Live").
   - **searchType**: Type of content being searched (e.g., "Game").
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started (true or false).
   - **startedOn**: The timestamp when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused (true or false).
   - **pausedOn**: The timestamp when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped (true or false).
   - **stoppedOn**: The timestamp when the stream was stopped; can be null.
   - **streamId**: Repeats the ID of the stream.
   - **channel**: The name of the channel (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - **category**: The category of the event (e.g., "Board").
   - **categoryId**: The ID associated with the category.
   - **subCategory**: A more specific category for the event (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: The ID associated with the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled to take place (e.g., "2024-02-01").
   - **scheduleTime**: The time when the event is scheduled to start (e.g., "18:00:00").
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours (e.g., 1 hour).
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: A URL to the cover photo for the event (e.g., "basketball-cover-url.jpg").
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL for playback on the provider; can be empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting; e.g., 100 tokens.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time duration for resetting voting options (e.g., 5 seconds).
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available (e.g., 4).
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button (e.g., "Layup").
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button (e.g., "Dunk").
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled or not (false here).
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if the tournament feature is enabled (true here).
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button for tournament actions (e.g., "Hit").
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button for tournament actions (e.g., "Miss").
   - **streamLocatorName**: The locator name for the stream (e.g., "basketball-locator-name").
   - **streamAssetName**: The name of the streaming asset (e.g., "basketball-asset-name").
   - **platformVideoIds**: An object containing identifiers for various platforms indicating if video IDs are available or false.
   - **platformEventIds**: An object containing identifiers for events on different platforms indicating if event IDs are available or false.
   - **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used (e.g., "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam").
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used (e.g., "WirelessAudioTek Device").
   - **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker used (e.g., "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0").
   - **additionalCameras**: An array of objects representing additional cameras with their associated microphones.
   - **createdDate**: The date the event details were created (e.g., "2024-02-18").
   - **createdTime**: The time the event details were created (e.g., "14:54:25").
   - **updatedDate**: The date the event details were last updated (e.g., "2024-02-24").
   - **updatedTime**: The time the event details were last updated (e.g., "23:29:19").
   - **deletedDate**: The date the event was deleted, if applicable; can be null.
   - **deletedTime**: The time the event was deleted, if applicable; can be null.
```
