request.description:
### API Endpoint: Delete Video Event on Discord

**Name:**

- Video - Event - Delete - Discord: This is the name of the API operation which indicates that it handles the deletion of a video event specifically related to Discord.

**Request Details:**

- **Method:** `POST`: This indicates that the request to delete the video event is sent as a POST method.

- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`: This is the endpoint where the delete request is directed.

**Headers:**

- **Content-Type:** `application/json`: Specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

**Body:**

The body of the request contains two main objects: `options` and `details`.

#### Options Object:

- **providerName:** `"discord"`: Specifies that the video event is associated with the Discord platform.

- **providerId:** `""`: Placeholder for a unique identifier for the provider, currently left blank.

- **apiKey:** `null`: This would typically hold the API key for authentication; it is currently set to null.

- **apiSecret:** `null`: This would hold a secret key related to the API, also currently null.

- **apiClientId:** `null`: Placeholder for the client ID of the API, currently set to null.

- **authToken:** `null`: This is intended to hold an authorization token, currently set to null.

- **server:** `null`: Placeholder for the server details, currently not specified.

- **rtmpUrl:** `null`: Placeholder for the RTMP streaming URL, currently not specified.

- **streamKey:** `null`: Placeholder for the stream key required for streaming, currently not specified.

- **channelUrl:** `null`: Placeholder for the URL of the channel, currently not specified.

- **authUsername:** `null`: Placeholder for the username used for authentication, currently set to null.

- **authPassword:** `null`: Placeholder for the password related to authentication, currently null.

- **uniqueKey:** `"uniqueKey"`: A unique identifier for the video event, specified as "uniqueKey".

- **videoId:** `"videoId"`: The identifier for the video to be deleted, specified as "videoId".

- **accountId:** `"accountId"`: Identifier for the account associated with the event, specified as "accountId".

- **channelId:** `"channelId"`: Identifier for the channel related to the event, specified as "channelId".

- **sessionId:** `"sessionId"`: Identifier for the current session, specified as "sessionId".

- **streamId:** `"streamId"`: Identifier for the streaming event, specified as "streamId".

- **ipAddress:** `null`: Placeholder for the IP address, currently set to null.

- **country:** `"United States"`: Indicates the country related to the event, set as "United States".

- **state:** `"California"`: Indicates the state related to the event, set as "California".

- **title:** `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`: Title of the video event.

- **description:** `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`: A brief description of what the video event is about.

- **tags:** `"basketball,game,challenge"`: Tags associated with the event to categorize it.

#### Details Object:

- **accountId:** `"accountId"`: Identifier for the account, repeated from options.

- **sessionId:** `"sessionId"`: Identifier for the session, repeated from options.

- **channelId:** `"channelId"`: Identifier for the channel, repeated from options.

- **videoId:** `"videoId"`: Identifier for the video, repeated from options.

- **title:** `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`: Title of the video event, repeated from options.

- **description:** `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`: Description of the event, repeated from options.

- **tags:** `"basketball,game,challenge"`: Tags for categorization, repeated from options.

- **streamType:** `"Live"`: Indicates that the video is a live event.

- **searchType:** `"Game"`: Type of event categorized for search purposes.

- **started:** `true`: Indicates whether the event has started.

- **startedOn:** `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`: Timestamp marking when the event started.

- **paused:** `false`: Indicates whether the event is currently paused.

- **pausedOn:** `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`: Timestamp marking when the event was paused.

- **stopped:** `false`: Indicates whether the event has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn:** `null`: Timestamp indicating when the event was stopped, currently set to null.

- **streamId:** `"streamId"`: Identifier for the stream, repeated for additional context.

- **channel:** `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`: The name of the channel where the event is broadcasted.

- **category:** `"Board"`: Category of the event.

- **categoryId:** `"categoryId"`: Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory:** `"Outdoor Party"`: Subcategory under which the event falls.

- **subCategoryId:** `"subCategoryId"`: Identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate:** `"2024-02-01"`: Date on which the event is scheduled.

- **scheduleTime:** `"18:00:00"`: Time at which the event is scheduled to begin.

- **streamHours:** `1`: Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl:** `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`: URL for the cover photo related to the event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`: URL for playback from the provider; currently blank.

- **voteTokenQuantity:** `100`: Quantity of tokens available for voting.

- **votingTimeReset:** `"5"`: Time duration in minutes for resetting voting time.

- **voteButtonQuantity:** `4`: Number of vote buttons available during the event.

- **voteButtonText1:** `"Layup"`: Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2:** `"Dunk"`: Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled:** `false`: Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the event.

- **isTournamentEnabled:** `true`: Indicates whether tournaments are enabled for the event.

- **tournamentButtonText1:** `"Hit"`: Text for the first button in the tournament.

- **tournamentButtonText2:** `"Miss"`: Text for the second button in the tournament.

- **streamLocatorName:** `"basketball-locator-name"`: The name used to locate the stream.

- **streamAssetName:** `"basketball-asset-name"`: Name of the asset related to the stream.

- **platformVideoIds:** Object containing identifiers for various platforms (YouTube, Twitch, etc.) with all values currently set to false, indicating no IDs are assigned.

- **platformEventIds:** Object containing identifiers for events on various platforms (Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) with all values currently set to false, indicating no event IDs are assigned.

- **primaryCameraName:** `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`: The name of the primary camera used for the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName:** `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`: The name of the primary microphone used for the event.

- **primarySpeakerName:** `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`: The name of the primary speaker used for the event.

- **additionalCameras:** Array of additional camera and microphone setups; currently consisting of two items.

- **createdDate:** `"2024-02-18"`: The date when the event was created.

- **createdTime:** `"14:54:25"`: The time when the event was created.

- **updatedDate:** `"2024-02-24"`: The date when the event was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** `"23:29:19"`: The time when the event was last updated.

- **deletedDate:** `null`: The date when the event was deleted, currently set to null as it has not been deleted.

- **deletedTime:** `null`: The time when the event was deleted, currently set to null as it has not been deleted.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description

**Name:** Video - Event - Create - Medium  
**Method:** POST  
**URL:** http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create  

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type:** Specifies that the content type of the request body is JSON.

#### Request Body
The body of the request is structured into two main parts: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName:** Indicates the name of the provider where the video is being streamed (e.g., "medium").
- **providerId:** Identifier for the provider, typically used for API interactions.
- **apiKey:** API key for authentication, if required by the provider.
- **apiSecret:** Secret key associated with the API key, used for authentication.
- **apiClientId:** Client ID for OAuth-related authorizations.
- **authToken:** Token used for authenticating a user session.
- **server:** Information about the server if needed (usually optional).
- **rtmpUrl:** URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, used to stream the video.
- **streamKey:** Unique key associated with the stream, often used for authentication.
- **channelUrl:** URL for the channel where the event will be streamed.
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication, if required.
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication, if required.
- **uniqueKey:** A unique identifier for this specific video event.
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video being created.
- **accountId:** Identifier for the user's account where the video is posted.
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel associated with the video.
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session during which the video is being created.
- **streamId:** Unique identifier for the streaming event.
- **ipAddress:** IP address of the host, usually for tracking or authentication.
- **country:** Country where the video event is being hosted (default is "United States").
- **state:** State where the video event is being hosted (default is "California").
- **title:** Title of the video event.
- **description:** Description providing details about the video event.
- **tags:** Tags associated with the video for categorization.

##### Details
- **accountId:** Identifier for the user's account.
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session.
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel.
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video.
- **title:** Title of the video event.
- **description:** Description of the video event.
- **tags:** Tags for categorizing the video.
- **streamType:** Type of streaming (e.g., Live).
- **searchType:** Type used for search categorization (e.g., Game).
- **started:** Boolean to indicate if the stream has started.
- **startedOn:** Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused:** Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn:** Timestamp when the stream was paused.
- **stopped:** Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
- **stoppedOn:** Timestamp when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
- **streamId:** Unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel:** Name of the channel where the event is streamed.
- **category:** Main category of the video (e.g., Board).
- **categoryId:** Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory:** Sub-category of the video (e.g., Outdoor Party).
- **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the event is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime:** Time when the event is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, if applicable.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** Quantity of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset:** Time (in minutes) before voting time resets.
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Indicates if rewards are enabled for the event.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Indicates if tournaments are enabled for this event.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName:** Name for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName:** Name for the assets used in the stream.
- **platformVideoIds:** Object containing output IDs for various platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch, etc.), each identified with a true/false value.
- **platformEventIds:** Object containing event IDs for various social platforms.
- **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker used for audio.
- **additionalCameras:** Array of objects containing names of additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
- **createdDate:** Date when the video event was created.
- **createdTime:** Time when the video event was created.
- **updatedDate:** Date when the video event was last updated.
- **updatedTime:** Time when the video event was last updated.
- **deletedDate:** Date when the video event was deleted, if applicable.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the video event was deleted, if applicable.

### Video - Event - Update - Medium Endpoint

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update an existing video event on the server.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: This is the endpoint where the request is sent to update a video event.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: This is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON-formatted data.

#### Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`. Below is a breakdown of each field within these sections.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the provider, in this case, "medium".
- **providerId**: Identifier for the provider; it is kept empty in this instance.
- **apiKey**: This field is for an API key, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Field reserved for API secret, currently null.
- **apiClientId**: Identifies the client for the API, currently null.
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication, currently null.
- **server**: Specifies the server; currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently null.
- **streamKey**: Key to access the stream; currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel; currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the event, set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, set to "videoId".
- **accountId**: Unique identifier for the account, set to "accountId".
- **channelId**: Unique identifier for the channel, set to "channelId".
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the session, set to "sessionId".
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream, set to "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: IP address; currently null.
- **country**: Country where the event is taking place; set to "United States".
- **state**: State where the event is taking place; set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the video event, detailing it as a "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Keywords related to the event, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details
- **accountId**: Repeated from options, set to "accountId".
- **sessionId**: Repeated from options, set to "sessionId".
- **channelId**: Repeated from options, set to "channelId".
- **videoId**: Repeated from options, set to "videoId".
- **title**: Repeated from options, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Repeated from options, set to describe the event.
- **tags**: Repeated from options, containing event-related keywords.
- **streamType**: The type of stream; set to "Live".
- **searchType**: The method of searching; set to "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the event has started; set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the event is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the event was paused, currently set to a specific date.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the event has stopped; set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Repeated from options, set to "streamId".
- **channel**: Name of the channel, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: The category of the event, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, set to "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: The subcategory of the event, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory, set to "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".

- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, set to "Layup".

- **deletedTime**: Time the event was deleted; currently null.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Overview: Video - Event - Delete - Medium

This endpoint is designed to delete a video event on the Medium platform. The request is sent as a POST method to the specified URL.

### Request Details:

- **Method**: POST
  - This is the HTTP method used to submit the delete request.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is made to delete a video event.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - Indicates that the request body format is JSON.

### Request Body:

The request body contains two main sections: **options** and **details**. 

#### Options:

1. **providerName**: `"medium"`
   - Specifies the platform provider from which the video event is being managed.

2. **providerId**: `""`
   - Identifier for the provider, left empty in this case.

3. **apiKey**: `null`
   - The API key required for authenticating with the provider, currently set to null.

4. **apiSecret**: `null`
   - The secret key associated with the API, not provided here.

5. **apiClientId**: `null`
   - Client ID for API access, currently not supplied.

6. **authToken**: `null`
   - Token used for authorizing user actions, not given.

7. **server**: `null`
   - Server information for API calls, left empty.

8. **rtmpUrl**: `null`
   - RTMP URL for streaming, not specified.

9. **streamKey**: `null`
   - Key for accessing the stream, currently not provided.

10. **channelUrl**: `null`
   - URL of the channel related to the video, not specified.

11. **authUsername**: `null`
   - Username for authentication, currently not provided.

12. **authPassword**: `null`
   - Password for authentication, left empty.

13. **uniqueKey**: `"uniqueKey"`
   - A unique identifier for the video event.

14. **videoId**: `"videoId"`
   - Identifier for the specific video to be deleted.

15. **accountId**: `"accountId"`
   - Owner's account identifier associated with the video.

16. **channelId**: `"channelId"`
   - Identifier for the channel where the video resides.

17. **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
   - ID for the current session of the user.

18. **streamId**: `"streamId"`
   - Identifier for the specific stream that is associated with the video event.

19. **ipAddress**: `null`
   - The IP address from which the request is made, not provided.

20. **country**: `"United States"`
   - The country associated with the request.

21. **state**: `"California"`
   - The state within the country of the request.

22. **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
   - Title of the video event.

23. **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
   - Description detailing the video content.

24. **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
   - Comma-separated tags that categorize the video event.

#### Details:

1. **accountId**: `"accountId"`
   - Matches the account ID in options, confirming ownership.

2. **sessionId**: `"sessionId"`
   - Identifies the current user session, consistent with options.

3. **channelId**: `"channelId"`
   - Matches channel identifier used in options.

4. **videoId**: `"videoId"`
   - Duplicated from options, identifies the specific video.

5. **title**: `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`
   - Same as the title provided in options.

6. **description**: `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`
   - Description confirming the content of the video event.

7. **tags**: `"basketball,game,challenge"`
   - Reiterates categorization for the video event.

8. **streamType**: `"Live"`
   - Indicates the type of stream, specifying it is a live event.

9. **searchType**: `"Game"`
   - Classification type for the search function related to the event.

10. **started**: `true`
    - Boolean indicating whether the event has started.

11. **startedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
    - Timestamp of when the event started.

12. **paused**: `false`
    - Indicates whether the event is currently paused.

13. **pausedOn**: `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`
    - Timestamp indicating when the event was paused (not applicable here).

14. **stopped**: `false`
    - Indicates whether the event has stopped.

15. **stoppedOn**: `null`
    - Timestamp for when the event stopped, currently not applicable.

16. **streamId**: `"streamId"`
    - Identifier for the stream associated with this event.

17. **channel**: `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`
    - Name of the channel hosting the video.

18. **category**: `"Board"`
    - The category under which the event is classified.

19. **categoryId**: `"categoryId"`
    - Identifier associated with the event category.

20. **subCategory**: `"Outdoor Party"`
    - Further classification of the event.

21. **subCategoryId**: `"subCategoryId"`
    - Identifier for the subcategory.

22. **scheduleDate**: `"2024-02-01"`
    - Date scheduled for the event.

23. **scheduleTime**: `"18:00:00"`
    - Time scheduled for the event.

24. **streamHours**: `1`
    - Duration of the stream in hours.

25. **coverPhotoUrl**: `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`
    - URL for the cover photo associated with the event.

26. **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
    - URL for playback through the provider, currently described as not available.

27. **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`
    - The number of tokens available for voting during the event.

28. **votingTimeReset**: `"5"`
    - Time in minutes for resetting voting interactions.

29. **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`
    - The number of voting buttons available during the event.

30. **voteButtonText1**: `"Layup"`
    - Text for the first voting button.

31. **voteButtonText2**: `"Dunk"`
    - Text for the second voting button.

32. **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`
    - Indicates whether rewards are enabled for this event.

33. **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`
    - Indicates whether a tournament feature is active for the event.

34. **tournamentButtonText1**: `"Hit"`
    - Text for the first tournament-related button.

35. **tournamentButtonText2**: `"Miss"`
    - Text for the second tournament-related button.

36. **streamLocatorName**: `"basketball-locator-name"`
    - Name used for locating the stream.

37. **streamAssetName**: `"basketball-asset-name"`
    - Name of the asset related to the stream.

38. **platformVideoIds**: *object*
    - Contains identifiers for video on various platforms, all set to `false`, indicating no output IDs are linked.

39. **platformEventIds**: *object*
    - Contains identifiers for events on various platforms, also set to `false`.

40. **primaryCameraName**: `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`
    - Specifies the primary camera being used for streaming.

41. **primaryMicrophoneName**: `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`
    - Specifies the primary microphone being used.

42. **primarySpeakerName**: `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`
    - Specifies the primary speaker being used.

43. **additionalCameras**: *array*
    - Contains additional cameras used, with camera-microphone pairs listed.

44. **createdDate**: `"2024-02-18"`
    - Date when the event was created.

45. **createdTime**: `"14:54:25"`
    - Time when the event was created.

46. **updatedDate**: `"2024-02-24"`
    - Date when the event was last updated.

47. **updatedTime**: `"23:29:19"`
    - Time when the event was last updated.

48. **deletedDate**: `null`
    - Indicates that the event has not been deleted yet.

49. **deletedTime**: `null`
    - Indicates that no deletion time has been recorded.

This information can be utilized to ensure proper functioning of the delete video event feature on the Medium platform and to support users in understanding the parameters involved in this API request.

request.description:
### Description of Data for Video - Event - Create - Tumblr Endpoint

**Endpoint Details**  
- **Name**: Video - Event - Create - Tumblr  
- **Method**: POST  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`  
- **Content-Type Header**: Specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

**Request Body Details**  

1. **options**: An object that contains settings related to the video event.
   - **providerName**: The name of the provider, which is "tumblr" in this case.
   - **providerId**: Optional ID of the provider. Can be left empty.
   - **apiKey**: Your API key for authentication, if required.
   - **apiSecret**: Your API secret for validation, if needed.
   - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API access, optional.
   - **authToken**: Token for authorization, can be empty if not needed.
   - **server**: Server information, can be left as null.
   - **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming, if applicable.
   - **streamKey**: Key used to authenticate the stream.
   - **channelUrl**: The URL for the channel related to the video event.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication if required.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication if required.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the event.
   - **videoId**: Unique identifier of the video.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the account managing the video.
   - **channelId**: Unique ID for the channel.
   - **sessionId**: ID for the session in which the event occurs.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being created.
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user, optional.
   - **country**: The country where the event is being held.
   - **state**: The state where the event is being held.
   - **title**: Title of the video event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: A brief description of the video event (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: Comma-separated list of tags relevant to the video (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **details**: An object containing specific details about the video event.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the account managing the event.
   - **sessionId**: ID of the session for the event.
   - **channelId**: Unique identifier for the channel.
   - **videoId**: Unique ID for the video being created.
   - **title**: Title of the video event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: Description of the video event.
   - **tags**: Comma-separated tags associated with the video.
   - **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream (e.g., "Live").
   - **searchType**: Type of category for search purposes (e.g., "Game").
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream stopped, if applicable.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **channel**: Name of the channel (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - **category**: Category of the event (e.g., "Board").
   - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
   - **subCategory**: Sub-category classification (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: ID for the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled to occur.
   - **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo for the event.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, can be left empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of vote tokens available for use.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Duration in seconds between vote resets.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of buttons available for voting.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the event.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name for the stream locator.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name for the stream asset.
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object storing video IDs from various platforms, indicating if a corresponding ID exists (all values are set to false for this example).
   - **platformEventIds**: Object storing event IDs from various platforms, indicating if an event ID exists (all values are set to false for this example).
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being utilized.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker system.
   - **additionalCameras**: Array of objects specifying additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the event details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the event details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, if applicable.
   - **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, if applicable.

This structure provides a comprehensive overview of the video event's parameters that users can modify and utilize for their Twitch event creation process.

request.description:
**Request Overview: Video - Event - Update - Tumblr**

This endpoint is used to update a video event associated with Tumblr. The request uses the PUT method to send the updated information to the specified URL and requires a JSON payload. The payload consists of two main sections: `options` and `details`.

### Request Details

- **Method**: PUT
  - This indicates that the request is intended to update an existing resource.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is sent.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This specifies that the request body contains JSON data.

### Body Structure

The body of the request is structured as follows:

#### Options

- **providerName**: "tumblr"
  - The name of the service provider where the video is hosted.

- **providerId**: `""`
  - An identifier for the provider (can be empty).

- **apiKey**, **apiSecret**, **apiClientId**, **authToken**, **server**, **rtmpUrl**, **streamKey**, **channelUrl**: `null`
  - These fields represent credentials and connection details needed to interact with the provider's API. They are currently null, indicating they may not be required or available.

- **authUsername**: `null`
  - Username for authentication with the service provider.

- **authPassword**: `null`
  - Password for authentication with the service provider.

- **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
  - A unique identifier for the video event.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - The identifier for the specific video that is being updated.

- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - The identifier for the user account associated with the video.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - The identifier for the channel where the video is streamed.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - A unique identifier for the current session.

- **streamId**: "streamId"

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Delete - Tumblr

- **Endpoint Name**: Video - Event - Delete - Tumblr
- **Request Method**: POST
- **Request URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource, in this case, it's set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body

**Options Object**: Contains necessary parameters for deleting a video event from the specified provider.

- **providerName**: Specifies the name of the provider (here it is set to "tumblr").
- **providerId**: This is a placeholder for the unique identifier of the provider; it may be left empty.
- **apiKey**: A field for an API key that may be necessary for authentication with the provider's services; currently null.
- **apiSecret**: A field for the API secret associated with the API key; currently null.
- **apiClientId**: Placeholder for the client ID for API usage; currently null.
- **authToken**: Placeholder for an authentication token; currently null.
- **server**: Identification of the server; currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL used for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP); currently null.
- **streamKey**: Key used for streaming video; currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel associated with the video; currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier to prevent conflicts during deletion; set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: The ID of the video to be deleted; set to "videoId".
- **accountId**: The account ID associated with the video; set to "accountId".
- **channelId**: The channel ID where the video is located; set to "channelId".
- **sessionId**: The session ID associated with the video; set to "sessionId".
- **streamId**: ID representing the video stream; set to "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: Placeholder for the IP address; currently null.
- **country**: Indicates the country related to the video event, set to "United States".
- **state**: Indicates the state related to the video event, set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video event, stating it's a basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags related to the video event, currently set to "basketball,game,challenge".

**Details Object**: Contains detailed information regarding the video event that will be deleted.

- **accountId**: The account ID of the user requesting the deletion; set to "accountId".
- **sessionId**: The session ID associated with the video; set to "sessionId".
- **channelId**: The channel ID relevant to the video; set to "channelId".
- **videoId**: The ID of the video to be deleted; set to "videoId".
- **title**: The title of the video event for clarity, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Repeats the description of the event as in the options object.
- **tags**: Repeats the related tags for the video event.
- **streamType**: Identifies the type of stream; here it is classified as "Live".
- **searchType**: The categorization method for searching; set to "Game".
- **started**: A boolean indicating whether the event has started; set to true.
- **startedOn**: A timestamp of when the event started (ISO format).
- **paused**: A boolean indicating whether the event is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the event was paused (ISO format).
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the event has been stopped; set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Placeholder for when the event was stopped; currently null.
- **streamId**: The ID representing the stream; set to "streamId".
- **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the video event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: A broader classification of the video content; set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: The identifier for the category; set to "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: A more specific classification within the category, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: The identifier for the sub-category; set to "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate**: The planned date for the event; set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: The planned time for the event; set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo for the event, currently set as a placeholder "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Placeholder for the URL to playback provided by the service; currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of voting tokens available for the event, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration in minutes before voting can be reset; set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons displayed; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the event; set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean indicating if a tournament is enabled for the event; set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: The name associated with the stream locator; set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: The name of the stream asset; set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing platform-specific video IDs, currently all set to false indicating no associated IDs for various platforms.
- **platformEventIds**: An object containing platform-specific event identifiers, currently all set to false indicating no associated event IDs for various platforms.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the event, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used, set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the speaker used for the event, set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional cameras and their associated microphones used for the event, each represented as an object (e.g., "camera-2" with "mic-2").
- **createdDate**: The date when the event was created, set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: The time when the event was created, set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: The date when the event was last updated, set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: The time when the event was last updated, set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Placeholder for the date the event was deleted; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Placeholder for the time the event was deleted; currently null.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Create - Wix

This endpoint is used to create a video event on Wix. Below are the details regarding the request body parameters required for this API call:

#### Request Body Parameters

**Options Object:**
- **providerName**: The name of the video service provider. In this case, it is Wix.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the video service provider.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authenticating requests. Could be `null` if not available.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for enhanced authentication. Can be `null`.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API. This field may be `null`.
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication, can be set to `null` if not applicable.
- **server**: The server information. Can be omitted or set as `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL for streaming, which can be `null`.
- **streamKey**: The unique stream key for authentication. This can also be set as `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel where the video will be streamed, can be `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authorization, if needed. This can be `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authorization, which may also be `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the event.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user’s account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from where the event is being streamed. Can be set as `null`.
- **country**: The country of the event. Default is set to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the event. Default is set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video event. Example: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A short description of the event. Example: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags associated with the event for easier search, example: "basketball,game,challenge".

**Details Object:**
- **accountId**: Matches the account identification in the options.
- **sessionId**: Matches the session identification in the options.
- **channelId**: Matches the channel identification in the options.
- **videoId**: Matches the video identification in the options.
- **title**: The event’s title, identical to the title in the options.
- **description**: The event’s description, identical to the description in the options.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the event, identical to the tags in the options.
- **streamType**: Specifies the type of stream. Example: "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search performance. Example: "Game".
- **started**: Boolean which indicates if the stream has started (`true` or `false`).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating whether the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has been stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
- **streamId**: Same as above, it’s the identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event. Example: "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Category under which the event falls. Example: "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: A further breakdown of the category. Example: "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: The date on which the event is scheduled. Example: "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: The time for the scheduled event to start. Example: "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Length of the stream in hours. Example: "1".
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event. Example: "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback after the event. Can be left as empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available for the event. Example: 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time value for resetting votes. Example: "5" (possibly in minutes).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available during the event. Example: 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button. Example: "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button. Example: "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the event.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled. Example: `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button. Example: "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button. Example: "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the locater for the streaming event. Example: "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset for the streaming event. Example: "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: A collection of video identifiers across various platforms, all set to `false` by default indicating they are not in use.
- **platformEventIds**: A collection of event identifiers across different platforms, also set to `false` by default.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for streaming. Example: "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for capturing audio. Example: "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker system used. Example: "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional camera and microphone setups used during the stream.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created. Example: "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created. Example: "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event details were last updated. Example: "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event details were last updated. Example: "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: The date the event was deleted, if applicable. Default is `null`.
- **deletedTime**: The time the event was deleted, if applicable. Default is `null`.

This structure outlines the requirements and configurations to successfully create a video event on the Wix platform through this API.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Event - Update - Wix

**Overview:**
This endpoint allows the user to update video event details in a Wix environment.

**Request Details:**

- **Method**: 
  - PUT
  - This method is used to update existing data on the server.

- **URL**: 
  - `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`
  - This is the endpoint that receives the request for updating video event information.

- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header indicates that the request body format is JSON.

**Request Body Structure:**

1. **options**: 
   - A JSON object containing configuration options for the video provider.
   - **providerName**: 
     - (string) The name of the video provider, here it's "wix".
   - **providerId**: 
     - (string) Identifier specific to the provider.
   - **apiKey**: 
     - (string or null) API key for authenticating with the provider.
   - **apiSecret**: 
     - (string or null) Secret key for the API.
   - **apiClientId**: 
     - (string or null) Client ID for the API.
   - **authToken**: 
     - (string or null) Access token for authorization.
   - **server**: 
     - (string or null) The server address for the provider.
   - **rtmpUrl**: 
     - (string or null) URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol.
   - **streamKey**: 
     - (string or null) Key for the streaming session.
   - **channelUrl**: 
     - (string or null) URL for accessing the video channel.
   - **authUsername**: 
     - (string or null) Username for authentication.
   - **authPassword**: 
     - (string or null) Password for authentication.
   - **uniqueKey**: 
     - (string) A unique identifier for the video event.
   - **videoId**: 
     - (string) The identifier for the video being updated.
   - **accountId**: 
     - (string) ID of the account associated with the video.
   - **channelId**: 
     - (string) ID of the channel where the video is hosted.
   - **sessionId**: 
     - (string) ID of the session for the event.
   - **streamId**: 
     - (string) Unique ID for the streaming session.
   - **ipAddress**: 
     - (string or null) IP address from which the request is made.
   - **country**: 
     - (string) The country associated with the video event (default is "United States").
   - **state**: 
     - (string) The state associated with the video event (default is "California").
   - **title**: 
     - (string) Title of the video event (example: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: 
     - (string) Description of the video event (example: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: 
     - (string) Comma-separated tags related to the video event (example: "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **details**: 
   - A JSON object containing various details of the video event.
   - **accountId**: 
     - (string) The account ID associated with the video.
   - **sessionId**: 
     - (string) The session ID for the event.
   - **channelId**: 
     - (string) The channel ID for the event.
   - **videoId**: 
     - (string) The unique video identifier.
   - **title**: 
     - (string) Title of the event.
   - **description**: 
     - (string) Description of the event.
   - **tags**: 
     - (string) Comma-separated tags.
   - **streamType**: 
     - (string) Type of stream, such as "Live".
   - **searchType**: 
     - (string) Criteria for searching; in this case, it is "Game".
   - **started**: 
     - (boolean) Indicates if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: 
     - (string) Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
   - **paused**: 
     - (boolean) Indicates if the stream is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: 
     - (string) Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: 
     - (boolean) Indicates if the stream is stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: 
     - (string or null) Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
   - **streamId**: 
     - (string) Unique ID for the ongoing stream.
   - **channel**: 
     - (string) Name of the channel (example: "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - **category**: 
     - (string) Main category of the video (example: "Board").
   - **categoryId**: 
     - (string) ID of the main category.
   - **subCategory**: 
     - (string) Sub-category for the video (example: "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: 
     - (string) ID of the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: 
     - (string) Date when the event is scheduled (example: "2024-02-01").
   - **scheduleTime**: 
     - (string) Time when the event is scheduled (example: "18:00:00").
   - **streamHours**: 
     - (integer) The duration of the stream in hours (e.g., 1 hour).
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: 
     - (string) URL for the cover photo of the event (example: "basketball-cover-url.jpg").
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
     - (string or null) Playback URL provided by the video provider.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: 
     - (integer) The quantity of tokens available for voting during the event.
   - **votingTimeReset**: 
     - (string) Duration for resetting voting time, typically in seconds.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: 
     - (integer) The number of voting buttons available for the event.
   - **voteButtonText1**: 
     - (string) Text for the first voting button (example: "Layup").
   - **voteButtonText2**: 
     - (string) Text for the second voting button (example: "Dunk").
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: 
     - (boolean) Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the event.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: 
     - (boolean) Indicates whether tournaments can be hosted during the event.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: 
     - (string) Text for the first tournament-related button (example: "Hit").
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: 
     - (string) Text for the second tournament-related button (example: "Miss").
   - **streamLocatorName**: 
     - (string) Name for locating the stream (example: "basketball-locator-name").
   - **streamAssetName**: 
     - (string) Name of the asset used for the stream (example: "basketball-asset-name").
   - **platformVideoIds**: 
     - A nested JSON object containing boolean values that indicate whether the video is linked to various platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch, Instagram).
   - **platformEventIds**: 
     - A nested JSON object containing boolean values that indicate whether the event is created on various social platforms (e.g., Facebook, LinkedIn).
   - **primaryCameraName**: 
     - (string) Name of the primary camera used for streaming (example: "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam").
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: 
     - (string) Name of the primary microphone used during the event (example: "WirelessAudioTek Device").
   - **primarySpeakerName**: 
     - (string) Name of the primary speaker used (example: "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0").
   - **additionalCameras**: 
     - (array) Array of objects, each representing additional camera setups along with their microphones.
   - **createdDate**: 
     - (string) Date when the event information was created.
   - **createdTime**: 
     - (string) Time when the event information was created.
   - **updatedDate**: 
     - (string) Date when the event information was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: 
     - (string) Time when the event information was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: 
     - (string or null) Date when the event information was deleted, if applicable.
   - **deletedTime**: 
     - (string or null) Time when the event information was deleted, if applicable.

request.description:
**Endpoint Overview: Video - Event - Delete - Wix**

This API endpoint allows the deletion of a video event on Wix. Below are the detailed descriptions of the data attributes included in the request.

1. **method**: The HTTP method used to make the request. In this case, it is a POST request indicating that data is being submitted to this endpoint.

2. **url**: The URL address where the API request is sent. This endpoint is hosted locally at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`.

3. **headers**: 
   - **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. It indicates that the request body is in JSON format.

4. **body**: Contains the main data being sent with the request. This is structured as a raw JSON string and includes:
   - **options**: Configuration options for the video event. This includes:
     - **providerName**: The name of the service provider. In this case, it is "wix".
     - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, typically used for integration purposes.
     - **apiKey**: The API key for authentication; currently set to null, indicating it may not be necessary or can be generated later.
     - **apiSecret**: A secret associated with the API key for secure access, currently set to null.
     - **apiClientId**: Client ID for the API, set to null.
     - **authToken**: A token for authenticating the request, currently set to null.
     - **server**: Information regarding the server; currently set to null.
     - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL; currently set to null.
     - **streamKey**: A key for accessing the stream; currently set to null.
     - **channelUrl**: The URL for the channel associated with the video; currently set to null.
     - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently set to null.
     - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently set to null.
     - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
     - **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being deleted.
     - **accountId**: Identifier for the associated account.
     - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
     - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
     - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
     - **ipAddress**: Client IP address, currently set to null.
     - **country**: The country where the service is being used, "United States" in this case.
     - **state**: The state within the country, "California."
     - **title**: The title of the video event, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
     - **description**: A brief description of the event: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
     - **tags**: Keywords associated with the event, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

   - **details**: More specific information about the video event which includes:
     - **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the event.
     - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session in which the event took place.
     - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the video.
     - **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with the event.
     - **title**: Title of the video event.
     - **description**: Description of the video event.
     - **tags**: Associated keywords for the event.
     - **streamType**: Type of stream, indicated as "Live."
     - **searchType**: Type of search for event categorization, designated as "Game."
     - **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to true.
     - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
     - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused, set to false.
     - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
     - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped, set to false.
     - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped; set to null since it is ongoing.
     - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
     - **channel**: Name of the channel, "Fortune's Basketball Channel."
     - **category**: Category of the video, labeled as "Board."
     - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
     - **subCategory**: A more specific classification within the category, set as "Outdoor Party."
     - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
     - **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled to take place.
     - **scheduleTime**: The time when the event is scheduled to start.
     - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.
     - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the event.
     - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently set to null.
     - **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of tokens available for voting in the event.
     - **votingTimeReset**: Duration for resetting voting time, in this case, set to "5" (presumably seconds/minutes).
     - **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of vote buttons available in the interface.
     - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, "Layup."
     - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, "Dunk."
     - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards for participation are enabled; currently set to false.
     - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled; currently set to true.
     - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in the tournament feature, "Hit."
     - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button, "Miss."
     - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream within the service.
     - **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset used for the stream.
     - **platformVideoIds**: Contains output IDs for multiple video platforms, all set to false, indicating no IDs are currently associated with any platforms.
     - **platformEventIds**: Lists all event IDs for multiple platforms, indicating no events have been created as all are set to false.
     - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
     - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio during the event.
     - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker system used for sound output.
     - **additionalCameras**: Array of additional camera and microphone setups used during the stream.
     - **createdDate**: Date when the event was created.
     - **createdTime**: Time when the event was created.
     - **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated.
     - **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated.
     - **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted; currently set to null since it is not deleted.
     - **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted; currently set to null.

This information collectively provides the necessary parameters for deleting a video event associated with Wix and helps the user understand the required data for making an effective API call.

This endpoint is designed to create a new video event on Twitter.

#### Request Details

- **Method**: `POST`

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`

request.description:
### Video - Event - Update - Twitter (X)

**Request Method:**  
- `PUT`  
This method is used to update existing resources on the server.

**Request URL:**  
- `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`  
This is the endpoint where the update request is sent.

**Headers:**  
- `Content-Type`: Indicates that the request body format is JSON.

**Body:**  
- The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

#### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider (e.g., "twitter") that is hosting the video event.
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider, left empty for now.
- **apiKey**: A key used for authentication with the provider’s API, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for API access, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID provided by the API, currently null.
- **authToken**: Token for authenticating the session, currently null.
- **server**: Information about the server, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: The key for accessing the stream, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel hosting the video, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key to identify the video event (set to "uniqueKey").
- **videoId**: The identifier for the specific video being updated (set to "videoId").
- **accountId**: The account associated with the video event (set to "accountId").
- **channelId**: The unique identifier of the channel (set to "channelId").
- **sessionId**: The session identifier for tracking (set to "sessionId").
- **streamId**: The unique stream identifier (set to "streamId").
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the server handling the event, currently null.
- **country**: The country in which the event is hosted (set to "United States").
- **state**: The state in which the event is hosted (set to "California").
- **title**: The title of the video event (set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: A brief description of the video event (set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: Keywords related to the video event (set to "basketball,game,challenge").

#### Details
- **accountId**: The same account identifier as in options (set to "accountId").
- **sessionId**: The same session identifier as in options (set to "sessionId").
- **channelId**: The same channel identifier as in options (set to "channelId").
- **videoId**: The same video identifier as in options (set to "videoId").
- **title**: The same title as in options (set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: The same description as in options (set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: The same tags as in options (set to "basketball,game,challenge").
- **streamType**: The type of stream being used (set to "Live").
- **searchType**: The category used for searching (set to "Game").
- **started**: Indicates if the event has started (set to true).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the event started (set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z").
- **paused**: Indicates if the event is currently paused (set to false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the event was paused, currently set to the same time as startedOn.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the event is stopped (set to false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the event was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: The same stream identifier as in options (set to "streamId").
- **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the event (set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
- **category**: The category type for the video event (set to "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category (set to "categoryId").
- **subCategory**: More specific category under the main category (set to "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory (set to "subCategoryId").
- **scheduleDate**: The date scheduled for the event (set to "2024-02-01").
- **scheduleTime**: The time scheduled for the event (set to "18:00:00").
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream (set to 1 hour).
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the video (set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg").
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL to playback the video on the provider’s site, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting (set to 100).
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds for resetting the voting (set to 5).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available (set to 4).
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button (set to "Layup").
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button (set to "Dunk").
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for this event (set to false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled (set to true).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button (set to "Hit").
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button (set to "Miss").
- **streamLocatorName**: A name for the locator of the stream (set to "basketball-locator-name").
- **streamAssetName**: The name of the assets associated with the stream (set to "basketball-asset-name").
- **platformVideoIds**: A collection of identifiers for various platforms, all currently set to false indicating no IDs are available.
- **platformEventIds**: A collection of identifiers for events across various platforms, all currently set to false indicating no IDs are available.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream (set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam").
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for the stream (set to "WirelessAudioTek Device").
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the stream (set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0").
- **additionalCameras**: An array containing additional camera and microphone information.
- **createdDate**: The date when this event was created (set to "2024-02-18").
- **createdTime**: The time when this event was created (set to "14:54:25").
- **updatedDate**: The date when this event was last updated (set to "2024-02-24").
- **updatedTime**: The time when this event was last updated (set to "23:29:19").
- **deletedDate**: The date when this event was marked as deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: The time when this event was marked as deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of the Endpoint Data

- **name**: This is a descriptive name for the API endpoint. It indicates that this endpoint is used to delete a video event related to Twitter (X).

- **request**: This object contains information about the API request being made.

  - **method**: Specifies the HTTP method used for the request, which is POST in this case. This indicates that data will be sent to the server to create, update, or delete a resource.

  - **url**: The endpoint URL where the API request is sent. Here, it is directed to `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`, indicating it's running on a local server for testing.

  - **headers**: This array contains headers for the request. 

    - **key**: The header key, which is "Content-Type" here.
    
    - **value**: This specifies the content type of the data being sent. It's set to "application/json", indicating that the request body will be in JSON format.

  - **body**: This object contains the data sent in the request, formatted in raw JSON.

    - **options**: An object that includes various options relevant to the video event deletion.

      - **providerName**: The name of the service provider, set to "twitter", indicating that the video event is linked to Twitter.

      - **providerId**: A placeholder for the identifier of the provider, currently empty.

      - **apiKey**: This would hold the API key for authentication, currently set to null.

      - **apiSecret**: Placeholder for the API secret, set to null.

      - **apiClientId**: This is for the client ID associated with the API, currently null.

      - **authToken**: This would be a token used for authorization, set to null.

      - **server**: Placeholder for the server information, currently null.

      - **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently null.

      - **streamKey**: Key associated with the stream, currently null.

      - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, currently null.

      - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.

      - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.

      - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the event, with value "uniqueKey".

      - **videoId**: The ID of the video to be deleted, with value "videoId".

      - **accountId**: The account ID associated with the video event, with value "accountId".

      - **channelId**: The ID for the channel where the video event is located, with value "channelId".

      - **sessionId**: ID associated with the session of the video event, with value "sessionId".

      - **streamId**: The ID for the stream, with value "streamId".

      - **ipAddress**: Placeholder for the IP address, currently null.

      - **country**: The country where the video event is hosted, set to "United States".

      - **state**: The state where the video event is hosted, set to "California".

      - **title**: Title of the video event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".

      - **description**: A brief description of the video event, set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."

      - **tags**: Keywords associated with the video event, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

    - **details**: Contains detailed information about the video event.

      - **accountId**: The account ID for the event, same as in 'options'.

      - **sessionId**: The session ID, same as in 'options'.

      - **channelId**: The channel ID, same as in 'options'.

      - **videoId**: The video ID, same as in 'options'.

      - **title**: Title of the event, reiterated from 'options'.

      - **description**: Description of the event, reiterated from 'options'.

      - **tags**: Tags associated with the event, reiterated from 'options'.

      - **streamType**: Type of stream, set to "Live", indicating that the event is a live stream.

      - **searchType**: Type of search for the event, set to "Game".

      - **started**: A boolean indicating whether the event has started, set to true.

      - **startedOn**: Timestamp when the event started, set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".

      - **paused**: A boolean indicating whether the event is paused, set to false.

      - **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the event was paused, matching the started timestamp here.

      - **stopped**: A boolean indicating whether the event is stopped, set to false.

      - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the event was stopped, currently null since it hasn't stopped.

      - **streamId**: The ID associated with the stream, matching with the options.

      - **channel**: Name of the channel for the event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".

      - **category**: Category of the event, set to "Board".

      - **categoryId**: ID associated with the category, with value "categoryId".

      - **subCategory**: Sub-category of the event, set to "Outdoor Party".

      - **subCategoryId**: ID associated with the sub-category, with value "subCategoryId".

      - **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".

      - **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled, set to "18:00:00".

      - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.

      - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".

      - **providerPlaybackUrl**: A URL for playback from the provider, currently set to empty.

      - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available, set to 100.

      - **votingTimeReset**: Specifies the time reset for voting, set to "5".

      - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.

      - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, set to "Layup".

      - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, set to "Dunk".

      - **isRewardsEnabled**: A flag to indicate if rewards are enabled for this event, set to false.

      - **isTournamentEnabled**: A flag indicating whether the tournament feature is enabled, set to true.

      - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".

      - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".

      - **streamLocatorName**: A name for identifying the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".

      - **streamAssetName**: A name for the stream asset, set to "basketball-asset-name".

      - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing IDs for various platforms where the video may be cross-posted or available. All fields current set to false indicating no IDs assigned yet.

      - **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for various platforms, similarly all fields currently set to false indicating no events assigned yet.
