request.description:
### Description of Each Data in the API Endpoint

**Endpoint Name:** Video - Event - Create - Instagram  
**Method:** POST  
**URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`  
**Content-Type:** application/json  

#### Request Body

1. **options**: An object containing various options for the video event creation.

   - **providerName**: The name of the platform providing the video service. In this case, it's set to "instagram".
   - **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider. Currently left empty.
   - **apiKey**: An optional API key for authentication. Currently set to null.
   - **apiSecret**: An optional API secret for authentication. Currently set to null.
   - **apiClientId**: An optional client ID for accessing API functionality. Currently set to null.
   - **authToken**: A token used for authorization if required. Currently set to null.
   - **server**: URL of the server where the video is being hosted. Currently set to null.
   - **rtmpUrl**: The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming. Currently set to null.
   - **streamKey**: A key used to authenticate the stream. Currently set to null.
   - **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel where the video will be streamed. Currently set to null.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, if required. Currently set to null.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, if required. Currently set to null.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event, used to distinguish it from others.
   - **videoId**: The ID assigned to the video being created.
   - **accountId**: The ID associated with the account creating the video.
   - **channelId**: The ID of the channel under which the video will be streamed.
   - **sessionId**: An identifier for the streaming session.
   - **streamId**: The ID for the specific stream.
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request originates. Currently set to null.
   - **country**: The country from which the event is being organized, here specified as "United States".
   - **state**: The state where the event is occurring, here specified as "California".
   - **title**: The title of the video event, which in this case is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description**: A brief overview of the video event, describing it as a "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - **tags**: A string of keywords associated with the event, useful for categorization; in this case, "basketball, game, challenge".

2. **details**: An object containing specific details about the video event.

   - **accountId**: Repeated from options, it identifies the account creating the event.
   - **sessionId**: Repeated from options, identifies the current session id.
   - **channelId**: Repeated from options, identifying the channel.
   - **videoId**: Repeated from options, identifying the video.
   - **title**: Same as options, specifies the title of the event.
   - **description**: Similar to options, a description of the video event.
   - **tags**: Reiterates keywords associated with the event.
   - **streamType**: Specifies the type of stream, in this case, it's "Live".
   - **searchType**: Indicates the type of search context, here it's labeled as "Game".
   - **started**: A boolean indicating if the event has begun (true).
   - **startedOn**: The date and time when the event started, provided in ISO format.
   - **paused**: A boolean indicating if the event is currently paused (false).
   - **pausedOn**: The date and time when the event was paused, provided in ISO format. 
   - **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the event has ended (false).
   - **stoppedOn**: The date and time when the event was stopped, currently set to null.
   - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
   - **channel**: The name of the channel, set here as "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
   - **category**: The general category of the event, specified as "Board".
   - **categoryId**: The unique identifier for the category.
   - **subCategory**: A specific subdivision of the main category, indicated as "Outdoor Party".
   - **subCategoryId**: The unique identifier for the subcategory.
   - **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled to take place, currently set to "2024-02-01".
   - **scheduleTime**: The time at which the event is set to start, given as "18:00:00".
   - **streamHours**: Number of hours the stream is expected to run, set to 1.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event image, currently pointing to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service, currently set to an empty string.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: No. of tokens available for voting, specified as 100.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds for resetting the voting period, here set to "5".
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of voting buttons available, currently indicated as 4.
   - **voteButtonText1**: The text for the first voting button, set as "Layup".
   - **voteButtonText2**: The text for the second voting button, set as "Dunk".
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating if rewards are enabled (false).
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled (true).
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, specified as "Hit".
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, specified as "Miss".
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name to locate the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".
   - **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset related to the stream, identified as "basketball-asset-name".
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for related video platforms, all currently set as false (not in use).
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for events on related platforms, all currently set as false (not in use).
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera being used for the stream, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone being used for the stream, specified as "WirelessAudioTek Device".
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speaker being used for the stream, set as "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
   - **additionalCameras**: An array of objects detailing additional cameras and their respective microphones.
       - **camera**: Name of the additional camera.
       - **microphone**: Name of the additional microphone.
   - **createdDate**: The date the event was created.
   - **createdTime**: The time the event was created.
   - **updatedDate**: The date the event was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: The time the event was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: The date the event was deleted if applicable (currently set to null).
   - **deletedTime**: The time the event was deleted if applicable (currently set to null).

request.description:
### Description of Data for Video - Event - Update - Instagram Endpoint

**Endpoint Overview:**
This endpoint is used to update a video event on Instagram. It requires a PUT request to the specified URL and accepts JSON data containing various information about the video and associated details.

---

#### Request Method:
- **Method:** PUT  
  This method is used to update existing resources on the server.

#### Request URL:
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`  
  This is the local endpoint where the update request is sent.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type:** `application/json`  
  This header indicates that the request body format is JSON.

---

#### Request Body:
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`. Each of these sections includes several fields.

**Options Section:**
- **providerName:** `instagram`  
  Specifies the name of the provider for the video event.
  
- **providerId:** `""`  
  An identifier for the provider; currently empty.
  
- **apiKey:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the API key required for authentication, currently not provided.
  
- **apiSecret:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the API secret, currently not provided.

- **apiClientId:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the API client ID, currently not provided.

- **authToken:** `null`  
  Authentication token for the API access, currently not provided.

- **server:** `null`  
  Placeholder for server information, currently not provided.

- **rtmpUrl:** `null`  
  URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently not provided.

- **streamKey:** `null`  
  Key used for streaming, currently not provided.

- **channelUrl:** `null`  
  URL for the channel, currently not provided.

- **authUsername:** `null`  
  Username for authentication, currently not provided.

- **authPassword:** `null`  
  Password for authentication, currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey:** `uniqueKey`  
  A unique identifier for this event.

- **videoId:** `videoId`  
  Identifier for the video being updated.

- **accountId:** `accountId`  
  Identifier for the account associated with the event.

- **channelId:** `channelId`  
  Identifier for the channel where the video is streamed.

- **sessionId:** `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the session of the video.

- **streamId:** `streamId`  
  Identifier for the stream.

- **ipAddress:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the IP address of the uploader, currently not provided.

- **country:** `United States`  
  The country where the event is taking place.

- **state:** `California`  
  The state where the event is taking place.

- **title:** `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  The title of the video event.

- **description:** `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  A brief description of the video event.

- **tags:** `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags associated with the event that can help in its discovery.

**Details Section:**
- **accountId:** `accountId`  
  Identifier for the account associated with the video.

- **sessionId:** `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the session in which the video is being conducted.

- **channelId:** `channelId`  
  Identifier for the video channel.

- **videoId:** `videoId`  
  Identifier for the video being updated.

- **title:** `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the video event.

- **description:** `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  Description of the video event.

- **tags:** `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags for the video event for better categorization and searchability.

- **streamType:** `Live`  
  Indicates the type of stream, which is live in this case.

- **searchType:** `Game`  
  Classification of the event for search purposes.

- **started:** `true`  
  Indicates if the video stream has started.

- **startedOn:** `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp indicating when the stream started.

- **paused:** `false`  
  Indicates if the stream is currently paused.

- **pausedOn:** `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.

- **stopped:** `false`  
  Indicates if the stream is currently stopped.

- **stoppedOn:** `null`  
  Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently not applicable.

- **streamId:** `streamId`  
  Identifier for the stream.

- **channel:** `Fortune's Basketball Channel`  
  Name of the channel hosting the stream.

- **category:** `Board`  
  Category of the event.

- **categoryId:** `categoryId`  
  Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory:** `Outdoor Party`  
  Subcategory of the event.

- **subCategoryId:** `subCategoryId`  
  Identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate:** `2024-02-01`  
  Date when the event is scheduled.

- **scheduleTime:** `18:00:00`  
  Time when the event is scheduled to start.

- **streamHours:** `1`  
  Duration of the event in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl:** `basketball-cover-url.jpg`  
  URL of the cover photo for the event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`  
  URL for playback from the provider, currently not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity:** `100`  
  Total quantity of voting tokens available for the event.

- **votingTimeReset:** `5`  
  Duration in minutes for resetting voting time.

- **voteButtonQuantity:** `4`  
  Number of voting buttons available.

- **voteButtonText1:** `Layup`  
  Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2:** `Dunk`  
  Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled:** `false`  
  Indicates if rewards are enabled for the event.

- **isTournamentEnabled:** `true`  
  Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled for the event.

- **tournamentButtonText1:** `Hit`  
  Text for the first tournament button.

- **tournamentButtonText2:** `Miss`  
  Text for the second tournament button.

- **streamLocatorName:** `basketball-locator-name`  
  Name used for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName:** `basketball-asset-name`  
  Name of the asset associated with the stream.

- **platformVideoIds:** 
  - Placeholder objects for identifiers across various platforms (YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, etc.). All fields are currently set to `false`.

- **platformEventIds:** 
  - Placeholder objects for identifiers across various social media platforms for events (Facebook, YouTube, etc.). All fields are currently set to `false`.

- **primaryCameraName:** `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`  
  The main camera being used for the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName:** `WirelessAudioTek Device`  
  The main microphone being used for the event.

- **primarySpeakerName:** `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`  
  The main speaker being used for the event.

- **additionalCameras:**  
  An array of additional cameras and microphones being used:
  - `{ "camera": "camera-2", "microphone": "mic-2" }`
  - `{ "camera": "camera-3", "microphone": "mic-3" }`

- **createdDate:** `2024-02-18`  
  Date when the event was created.

- **createdTime:** `14:54:25`  
  Time when the event was created.

- **updatedDate:** `2024-02-24`  
  Date when the event was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** `23:29:19`  
  Time when the event was last updated.

- **deletedDate:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the date when the event was deleted, currently not applicable.

- **deletedTime:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the time when the event was deleted, currently not applicable.

--- 

This detailed outline should help users understand what data is needed when making updates to video events on Instagram using this API endpoint.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Delete - Instagram

This API endpoint is used to delete a video event on Instagram. Below is a detailed description of the data structure used in the request.

#### Request Method:
- **Method:** POST  
  This indicates that the request will send data to the server to perform an action (in this case, deleting a video event).

#### Request URL:
- **URL:** http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete  
  This is the address where the API request is sent.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type:** application/json  
  This header specifies that the request body will be in JSON format.

#### Request Body:
The request body contains two main objects: `options` and `details`. Here’s the breakdown:

##### Options Object:
- **providerName:** "instagram"  
  The name of the service provider (Instagram) where the video belongs.
  
- **providerId:** ""  
  A unique identifier for the provider (can be left empty).
  
- **apiKey:** null  
  The API key for authentication with the service (not provided).
  
- **apiSecret:** null  
  The secret key used for secure API access (not provided).
  
- **apiClientId:** null  
  The ID for the client application making the request (not provided).
  
- **authToken:** null  
  The authentication token for the user (not provided).
  
- **server:** null  
  The server information (not provided).
  
- **rtmpUrl:** null  
  The RTMP URL for streaming (not provided).
  
- **streamKey:** null  
  The key for streaming (not provided).
  
- **channelUrl:** null  
  URL of the channel on which the video is streamed (not provided).
  
- **authUsername:** null  
  The username required for authentication (not provided).
  
- **authPassword:** null  
  The password required for authentication (not provided).
  
- **uniqueKey:** "uniqueKey"  
  A unique identifier for this video event.
  
- **videoId:** "videoId"  
  The ID of the video that is being deleted.
  
- **accountId:** "accountId"  
  The ID of the account associated with the video.
  
- **channelId:** "channelId"  
  The ID of the channel where the video is hosted.
  
- **sessionId:** "sessionId"  
  The ID of the session related to the video event.
  
- **streamId:** "streamId"  
  The ID of the stream associated with the video.
  
- **ipAddress:** null  
  The IP address from which the request is being made (not provided).
  
- **country:** "United States"  
  The country of the account or user (set to the United States).
  
- **state:** "California"  
  The state of the account or user (set to California).
  
- **title:** "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"  
  The title of the video event.
  
- **description:** "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."  
  A brief description of what the video event entails.
  
- **tags:** "basketball,game,challenge"  
  Comma-separated tags associated with the video event.

##### Details Object:
- **accountId:** "accountId"  
  The same account ID as in options for reference.
  
- **sessionId:** "sessionId"  
  Session ID for tracking.
  
- **channelId:** "channelId"  
  Channel ID for reference.
  
- **videoId:** "videoId"  
  Video ID for the event.
  
- **title:** "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"  
  Title remains consistent with the options.
  
- **description:** "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."  
  Description remains consistent with the options.
  
- **tags:** "basketball,game,challenge"

request.description:
### Description of Each Data in the Endpoint

#### Request Information
- **Method**: Represents the HTTP method used for the request, which here is POST, indicating that data is being sent to the server to create a new resource.
- **URL**: Specifies the endpoint for submitting the request, which is located at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`.
- **Headers**: Contains metadata for the request.
  - **Content-Type**: Set to `application/json`, which tells the server that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Body
The body of the request is structured in two main parts: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the provider, set to "reddit" for this event.
- **providerId**: A placeholder for a unique identifier of the provider.
- **apiKey**: Placeholder for the API key, currently set to null, indicating no authentication key is provided.
- **apiSecret**: Placeholder for the API secret, currently null.
- **apiClientId**: Placeholder for the API client ID, currently null.
- **authToken**: Placeholder for the authentication token, currently null.
- **server**: Placeholder for server information, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: Placeholder for Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL, currently null.
- **streamKey**: Placeholder for the stream key, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: Placeholder for the channel URL, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Placeholder for username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Placeholder for password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this specific event.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with this event.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account hosting the event.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the event will take place.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session in which the event occurs.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream of this event.
- **ipAddress**: Current IP address, currently null.
- **country**: The country associated with the event, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state associated with the event, set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video/event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the event, describing it as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags associated with the event, allowing for better categorization and searchability, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details
- **accountId**: Reiterates the identifier for the user account hosting the event.
- **sessionId**: Reiterates the identifier for the session in which the event occurs.
- **channelId**: Reiterates the channel ID where the event is being hosted.
- **videoId**: Reiterates the video ID associated with this event.
- **title**: Reiterates the event title.
- **description**: Reiterates the event description.
- **tags**: Reiterates the tags associated with the event.
- **streamType**: Specifies the type of stream, which is "Live" for this event.
- **searchType**: Indicates the type used for searching events, set to "Game".
- **started**: A boolean indicating whether the event has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event started.
- **paused**: A boolean showing whether the event is paused, currently set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp related to when the event was paused.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating whether the event has stopped, currently set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the event stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Reiterates the identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: General category for the event, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category of the event.
- **subCategory**: Subcategory for the event, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory of the event.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the event is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled to start, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Specifies the expected duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Placeholder for playback URL from the provider.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number representing the quantity of tokens available for voting on the event.
- **votingTimeReset**: The interval for resetting the voting period, set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Indicates the number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting option, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting option, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled for this event, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether a tournament is included in the event, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name designated for locating the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset associated with the stream, set to "basketball-asset-name".

##### Platform Identifiers
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various social media platforms related to the video publication.
- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms related to event creation and management.

##### Equipment Information
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera equipment used for the event, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the event, set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects listing additional cameras and their associated microphones used during the event.

##### Timestamps
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created, set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created, set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated, set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated, set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Delete - Reddit

This request is used to delete a video event from Reddit. Below are the details for each data point included in the request:

#### Request Details

- **Method**: 
  - POST - This indicates that we are submitting data to the server to delete the event.

- **URL**: 
  - `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete` - This is the endpoint where the request is sent, indicating a local server handling video event deletions.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: 
    - `application/json` - This specifies that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body

##### Options

- **providerName**: 
  - `reddit` - The name of the platform (provider) where the video event is hosted.

- **providerId**: 
  - An identifier for the provider, usually required for specific provider operations. This is empty here.

- **apiKey**: 
  - null - The API key for authentication with the provider's API, not provided here.

- **apiSecret**: 
  - null - A secret key for secure API access, also not provided.

- **apiClientId**: 
  - null - This ID is used to identify the client making the API requests. No value is given here.

- **authToken**: 
  - null - An authorization token for user authentication, not included.

- **server**: 
  - null - Information about the server which might be needed for processing, not provided.

- **rtmpUrl**: 
  - null - A URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol streaming, not supplied.

- **streamKey**: 
  - null - A key used to identify and authenticate a live stream, which is omitted.

- **channelUrl**: 
  - null - The URL for the associated channel where the video would be published; left empty.

- **authUsername**: 
  - null - Username for authentication, not provided.

- **authPassword**: 
  - null - Password for user authentication, which is not included.

- **uniqueKey**: 
  - `uniqueKey` - A unique identifier for the video or event, allowing for precise deletion.

- **videoId**: 
  - `videoId` - The ID of the specific video to be deleted.

- **accountId**: 
  - `accountId` - The ID of the user account that owns the video event.

- **channelId**: 
  - `channelId` - The ID representing the channel hosting the video event.

- **sessionId**: 
  - `sessionId` - An identifier for the session under which the video was streamed.

- **streamId**: 
  - `streamId` - The ID representing the streaming session for the video.

- **ipAddress**: 
  - null - The IP address from which the request is made, left unspecified.

- **country**: 
  - `United States` - The country where the event or account is based.

- **state**: 
  - `California` - The state within the country specified for the location details.

- **title**: 
  - `Fortune's Basketball Challenge` - The title of the video event that is being deleted.

- **description**: 
  - `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.` - Brief description of the event contents.

- **tags**: 
  - `basketball,game,challenge` - Keywords associated with the video event for categorization.

##### Details

- **accountId**: 
  - `accountId` - Same identifier as above for the account owning the event.

- **sessionId**: 
  - `sessionId` - Identifier for the session during which the event was streamed, reiterated here.

- **channelId**: 
  - `channelId` - ID for the channel which hosts the video event, repeated.

- **videoId**: 
  - `videoId` - Identifier for the video tied to this event, reiterated.

- **title**: 
  - `Fortune's Basketball Challenge` - The designated title of the event, repeated for clarity.

- **description**: 
  - `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.` - A description reiterating the video's content.

- **tags**: 
  - `basketball,game,challenge` - Tags for identifying the video, repeated.

- **streamType**: 
  - `Live` - Indicates that this was a live streaming event.

- **searchType**: 
  - `Game` - The type of content being categorized, identified as a game.

- **started**: 
  - true - Indicates that the live stream has commenced.

- **startedOn**: 
  - `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z` - The exact timestamp when the event started.

- **paused**: 
  - false - Indicates that the live stream has not been paused.

- **pausedOn**: 
  - `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z` - Timestamp of when the stream was paused, applicable if paused were true.

- **stopped**: 
  - false - Indicates that the live stream has not been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: 
  - null - Timestamp where the stream stopped, not applicable as the stream is currently live.

- **streamId**: 
  - `streamId` - An identifier for the stream connected to the event.

- **channel**: 
  - `Fortune's Basketball Channel` - The channel on which the event was hosted.

- **category**: 
  - `Board` - Defines the type of content category for the event.

- **categoryId**: 
  - `categoryId` - An ID associated with the category.

- **subCategory**: 
  - `Outdoor Party` - More specific categorization under the main category.

- **subCategoryId**: 
  - `subCategoryId` - Unique identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate**: 
  - `2024-02-01` - Date scheduled for the event to take place.

- **scheduleTime**: 
  - `18:00:00` - The time scheduled for the event.

- **streamHours**: 
  - 1 - The duration of the stream as specified in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: 
  - `basketball-cover-url.jpg` - URL pointing to the cover photo for the event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - Empty - URL for playback of the event on the provider’s platform, not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: 
  - 100 - The total quantity of tokens for voting during the event.

- **votingTimeReset**: 
  - `5` - Time duration to reset the voting options, most likely in seconds.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: 
  - 4 - Number of voting buttons available during the event.

- **voteButtonText1**: 
  - `Layup` - Text displayed on the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: 
  - `Dunk` - Text displayed on the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: 
  - false - Indicates if rewards are enabled for this event.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: 
  - true - Specifies that tournament features are enabled for the event.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: 
  - `Hit` - Text for the first button related to tournament functions.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: 
  - `Miss` - Text for the second button related to tournament functions.

- **streamLocatorName**: 
  - `basketball-locator-name` - A name identifier for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: 
  - `basketball-asset-name` - Name associated with the stream assets.

- **platformVideoIds**: 
  - A structure holding various IDs related to different platforms, all currently set to false, indicating no mapped IDs.

- **platformEventIds**: 
  - Similar structure to `platformVideoIds`, holding various event IDs from platforms, also set to false.

- **primaryCameraName**: 
  - `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam` - The name of the primary camera used for the stream.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: 
  - `WirelessAudioTek Device` - The primary microphone used for audio capture.

- **primarySpeakerName**: 
  - `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0` - Name of the main speaker device.

- **additionalCameras**: 
  - An array of additional camera and microphone pairings used for the event.

- **createdDate**: 
  - `2024-02-18` - Date the event was created.

- **createdTime**: 
  - `14:54:25` - Time the event was created on the specified date.

- **updatedDate**: 
  - `2024-02-24` - Last date on which the event details were updated.

- **updatedTime**: 
  - `23:29:19` - Last time updated on the specified date.

- **deletedDate**: 
  - null - This will store the date of deletion if applicable, currently not set.

- **deletedTime**: 
  - null - This will store the time of deletion if applicable, currently not set.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Create - Telegram Endpoint Description

#### Request Method
- **Method:** POST  
  This request is sent using the POST method, which is typically used to create or submit new data to a server.

#### Request URL
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/create`  
  The API endpoint where the request is directed. This endpoint is used to create a new video event in the system.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type:** application/json  
  Specifies the media type of the resource. Here, it indicates that the body of the request is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName:** "telegram"  
  The name of the video streaming provider. In this case, it is set to Telegram.

- **providerId:** ""  
  A unique identifier for the provider. Currently set as an empty string.

- **apiKey:** null  
  The API key used to authenticate the requests to the provider. Currently not provided.

- **apiSecret:** null  
  The API secret for additional security. Also not provided.

- **apiClientId:** null  
  An identifier for the client making the request, which is currently not given.

- **authToken:** null  
  A token for authorization purposes; currently not supplied.

- **server:** null  
  Information regarding the server; currently not specified.

- **rtmpUrl:** null  
  The RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL used for streaming. Not provided.

- **streamKey:** null  
  A unique key for the stream, not specified in this request.

- **channelUrl:** null  
  URL of the channel where the video will be streamed; currently not specified.

- **authUsername:** null  
  Username for authentication; currently not specified.

- **authPassword:** null  
  Password for authentication; currently not specified.

- **uniqueKey:** "uniqueKey"  
  A custom unique key for the video event, used to identify the event uniquely.

- **videoId:** "videoId"  
  Identifier for the video; placeholder value used.

- **accountId:** "accountId"  
  Identifier for the user’s account; placeholder value used.

- **channelId:** "channelId"  
  Identifier for the channel relevant to the video event; placeholder value used.

- **sessionId:** "sessionId"  
  Identifier for the session related to the video event; placeholder value used.

- **streamId:** "streamId"  
  Identifier for the specific stream; placeholder value used.

- **ipAddress:** null  
  IP address of the user creating the event; currently not provided.

- **country:** "United States"  
  The country where the event is taking place.

- **state:** "California"  
  The state within the country of the event.

- **title:** "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"  
  The title of the video event.

- **description:** "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."  
  A description of what the video event entails.

- **tags:** "basketball,game,challenge"  
  A comma-separated list of tags that categorize the video event.

##### Details
- **accountId:** "accountId"  
  Identifier for the user’s account; placeholder value used.

- **sessionId:** "sessionId"  
  Identifier for the session relevant to the video event; placeholder value used.

- **channelId:** "channelId"  
  Identifier for the channel relevant to the video event; placeholder value used.

- **videoId:** "videoId"  
  Identifier for the video; placeholder value used.

- **title:** "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"  
  Title of the video event being created.

- **description:** "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."  
  Description of the video event.

- **tags:** "basketball,game,challenge"  
  Tags associated with the video event.

- **streamType:** "Live"  
  Indicates that the stream is live.

- **searchType:** "Game"  
  Indicates that the event is categorized as a game.

- **started:** true  
  Boolean to indicate if the event has started.

- **startedOn:** "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"  
  Timestamp indicating when the event started.

- **paused:** false  
  Indicates whether the event is currently paused.

- **pausedOn:** "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"  
  Timestamp indicating when the event was paused; here it’s not paused.

- **stopped:** false  
  Indicates whether the event has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn:** null  
  Timestamp indicating when the event was stopped; currently not specified.

- **streamId:** "streamId"  
  Identifier for the specific stream; placeholder value used.

- **channel:** "Fortune's Basketball Channel"  
  The name of the channel where the event is streamed.

- **category:** "Board"  
  The main category of the event.

- **categoryId:** "categoryId"  
  Identifier for the category; placeholder value used.

- **subCategory:** "Outdoor Party"  
  The sub-category under which the event falls.

- **subCategoryId:** "subCategoryId"  
  Identifier for the sub-category; placeholder value used.

- **scheduleDate:** "2024-02-01"  
  The date when the event is scheduled to take place.

- **scheduleTime:** "18:00:00"  
  Time when the event is scheduled to start.

- **streamHours:** 1  
  Duration of the event in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl:** "basketball-cover-url.jpg"  
  URL of the cover photo for the video event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** ""  
  URL for playback on the provider’s platform; currently not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity:** 100  
  Number of tokens available for voting during the event.

- **votingTimeReset:** "5"  
  Duration in seconds for voting time reset.

- **voteButtonQuantity:** 4  
  Number of voting buttons available for viewers.

- **voteButtonText1:** "Layup"  
  Text displayed on the first vote button.

- **voteButtonText2:** "Dunk"  
  Text displayed on the second vote button.

- **isRewardsEnabled:** false  
  Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the event.

- **isTournamentEnabled:** true  
  Indicates whether a tournament feature is enabled for the event.

- **tournamentButtonText1:** "Hit"  
  Text for the first button in the tournament feature.

- **tournamentButtonText2:** "Miss"  
  Text for the second button in the tournament feature.

- **streamLocatorName:** "basketball-locator-name"  
  Name used to locate the stream.

- **streamAssetName:** "basketball-asset-name"  
  Name of the asset for the stream.

- **platformVideoIds:** Object with various platform output IDs, all set to false, indicating no IDs are provided for these platforms.

- **platformEventIds:** Object with various platform event IDs, all set to false, indicating no event IDs are provided for these platforms.

- **primaryCameraName:** "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"  
  Name of the primary camera used for capturing the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName:** "WirelessAudioTek Device"  
  Name of the primary microphone used for capturing audio.

- **primarySpeakerName:** "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"  
  Name of the primary speaker used for sound output.

- **additionalCameras:**  
  An array containing objects for additional cameras and microphones used in the event setup.

- **createdDate:** "2024-02-18"  
  The date the event was created.

- **createdTime:** "14:54:25"  
  The time the event was created.

- **updatedDate:** "2024-02-24"  
  The date the event was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** "23:29:19"  
  The time the event was last updated.

- **deletedDate:** null  
  The date the event was deleted; currently not specified.

- **deletedTime:** null  
  The time the event was deleted; currently not specified.

request.description:
**Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Telegram**

This endpoint is designed to update video events related to Telegram. It allows users to modify the event details concerning streaming information, video metadata, and account settings.

### Request Details
- **Method**: `PUT`
  - This method is used to update existing resources on the server.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update`
  - This is the endpoint where the request will be sent to update video event details.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - Specifies that the request body format is JSON.

### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

#### Options
- **providerName**: String
  - Specifies the name of the service provider, in this case, `telegram`.

- **providerId**: String
  - An identifier for the provider, can be left empty if not applicable.

- **apiKey**: String or Null
  - API key for authentication with the provider, if required.

- **apiSecret**: String or Null
  - Secret key for additional security, if the provider requires it.

- **apiClientId**: String or Null
  - Client identifier for API calls.

- **authToken**: String or Null
  - Token for authentication with the provider.

- **server**: String or Null
  - The server URL if applicable to the provider.

- **rtmpUrl**: String or Null
  - URL used for Real-Time Messaging Protocol.

- **streamKey**: String or Null
  - Key used to identify the stream.

- **channelUrl**: String or Null
  - URL to the specific channel on the platform.

- **authUsername**: String or Null
  - Username for authentication, if required.

- **authPassword**: String or Null
  - Password for authentication, if required.

- **uniqueKey**: String
  - A unique key to identify the video event.

- **videoId**: String
  - Identifier for the video being updated.

- **accountId**: String
  - Identifier for the user’s account.

- **channelId**: String
  - Identifier for the channel associated with the event.

- **sessionId**: String
  - Session identifier for the current stream.

- **streamId**: String
  - Unique identifier for the stream.

- **ipAddress**: String or Null
  - IP address of the user streaming.

- **country**: String
  - Country of the streaming event, default set to `United States`.

- **state**: String
  - State of the streaming event, default set to `California`.

- **title**: String
  - Title of the video event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".

- **description**: String
  - Brief description of the event, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."

- **tags**: String
  - Comma-separated tags related to the event, e.g., "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Details
- **accountId**: String
  - The account identifier similar to the options section.

- **sessionId**: String
  - Session identifier matching that in the options section.

- **channelId**: String
  - Channel identifier matching that in options.

- **videoId**: String
  - Video identifier matching that in options.

- **title**: String
  - Title of the event, matches the options section.

- **description**: String
  - Description of the event, matches the options section.

- **tags**: String
  - Tags pertaining to the event, matches the options section.

- **streamType**: String
  - Indicates the type of stream, specified as `Live`.

- **searchType**: String
  - Indicates the type of content for search purposes, set as `Game`.

- **started**: Boolean
  - Indicates whether the stream has started, default is `true`.

- **startedOn**: String (Date-Time)
  - Timestamp indicating when the stream started.

- **paused**: Boolean
  - Indicates whether the stream is currently paused, default is `false`.

- **pausedOn**: String (Date-Time)
  - Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.

- **stopped**: Boolean
  - Indicates whether the stream has been stopped, default is `false`.

- **stoppedOn**: String (Date-Time or Null)
  - Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, can be null if ongoing.

- **streamId**: String
  - Stream identifier matching that in the options.

- **channel**: String
  - Name of the channel where the event is taking place, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel".

- **category**: String
  - Category of the video content, set as "Board".

- **categoryId**: String
  - Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory**: String
  - Sub-category of the video content, e.g., "Outdoor Party".

- **subCategoryId**: String
  - Identifier for the sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: String (Date)
  - Date when the event is scheduled to occur.

- **scheduleTime**: String (Time)
  - Time when the event is scheduled to start.

- **streamHours**: Integer
  - Duration in hours for which the stream is set to run.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: String
  - URL for the cover photo associated with the event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: String
  - URL to playback the video from the provider, if available.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: Integer
  - Number of tokens available for voting during the event.

- **votingTimeReset**: String
  - Duration in seconds for resetting the voting time.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: Integer
  - Number of voting buttons available.

- **voteButtonText1**: String
  - Text label for the first voting button, e.g., "Layup".

- **voteButtonText2**: String
  - Text label for the second voting button, e.g., "Dunk".

- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean
  - Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the event, default is `false`.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean
  - Indicates whether the tournament feature is enabled, default is `true`.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: String
  - Text for the first tournament button, e.g., "Hit".

- **tournamentButtonText2**: String
  - Text for the second tournament button, e.g., "Miss".

- **streamLocatorName**: String
  - Name used for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: String
  - Name of the asset for the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**: Object
  - Contains Boolean values indicating whether the video is available on various platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch, etc.).

- **platformEventIds**: Object
  - Contains Boolean values indicating whether events have been created on multiple platforms (e.g., Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).

- **primaryCameraName**: String
  - Name of the main camera used for streaming, e.g., "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: String
  - Name of the primary microphone used for audio, e.g., "WirelessAudioTek Device".

- **primarySpeakerName**: String
  - Name of the primary speaker device used for output, e.g., "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".

- **additionalCameras**: Array
  - Contains objects for additional cameras and their respective microphones used during the stream.

- **createdDate**: String (Date)
  - Date when the event was created.

- **createdTime**: String (Time)
  - Time when the event was created.

- **updatedDate**: String (Date)
  - Date when the event details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: String (Time)
  - Time when the event details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: String (Date or Null)
  - Date when the event was deleted, if applicable.

- **deletedTime**: String (Time or Null)
  - Time when the event was deleted, if applicable.

This endpoint allows comprehensive updates to video streaming events, ensuring all necessary details are maintained and modified as required.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Delete - Telegram

This endpoint is used to send a request for deleting a video event in the Telegram provider. Below is a breakdown of the data structure included in the request body:

#### Request Properties

- **method**: Specifies the HTTP method as POST for the request.
- **url**: The endpoint URL where the request is sent is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`.
  
#### Headers

- **Content-Type**: Indicates the media type of the resource as `application/json`.

#### Body Structure

The body of the request contains two main properties: `options` and `details`.

##### Options Object

This object includes settings specific to the video event:

- **providerName**: The name of the video provider, set to "telegram".
- **providerId**: Identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: Field for API key, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Field for API secret, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for accessing the API, currently null.
- **authToken**: Authentication token, currently null.
- **server**: Server information, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: RTMP URL for streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: Key used for streaming, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event.
- **videoId**: The ID of the video being deleted.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session of the video event.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream associated with the video.
- **ipAddress**: IP address, currently null.
- **country**: The country associated with this event is "United States".
- **state**: The state associated with this event is "California".
- **title**: The title of the video event, here it is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the event, "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags related to the event, here listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Details Object

This object contains comprehensive information about the video event:

- **accountId**: Identifier for the account related to the event.
- **sessionId**: The ID associated with the session of this event.
- **channelId**: The ID for the channel that hosts this video event.
- **videoId**: The ID of the specific video identified for deletion.
- **title**: The title of the video event, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the event.
- **tags**: Tags relevant to the video event.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream as "Live".
- **searchType**: Defines the search type, which is "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the event has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp marking when the event started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the event is paused, currently false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the event was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the event has stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the event was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event, "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: The category of the video, "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, currently set as "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the event, "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the video event is scheduled, "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the event is scheduled, "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo associated with the event.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL for the provider, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of vote tokens available, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration in minutes to reset voting time, set to 5.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available for interaction, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text displayed on the first vote button, "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for this event, currently false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled for this event, currently true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator, "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset used for the stream, "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing boolean values for various video platform IDs, indicating whether they are available (e.g., youtubeOutputId, twitchOutputId).
- **platformEventIds**: An object listing boolean values for various event IDs from different platforms, indicating whether they are available.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used, "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used, "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker used, "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: Array containing objects for additional cameras and microphones used in the event.
- **createdDate**: Date when the event was created, "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the event was created, "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date when the event was last updated, "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated, "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Create - TikTok

This API endpoint is used to create a video event specifically on TikTok. Below is a detailed description of each field in the request body.

#### Request Body Structure

1. **options**:
   - **providerName**: Specifies the name of the video provider, which is "tiktok" in this case.
   - **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider (currently empty).
   - **apiKey**: The API key for authentication (null if not provided).
   - **apiSecret**: The secret key for API access (null if not provided).
   - **apiClientId**: The client ID for API authentication (null if not provided).
   - **authToken**: Token used for authorization (null if not provided).
   - **server**: Server address for API requests (null if not provided).
   - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming (null if not provided).
   - **streamKey**: Key required to start a stream (null if not provided).
   - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel where the event will take place (null if not provided).
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication (null if not provided).
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication (null if not provided).
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique key identifier for the event.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being created.
   - **accountId**: ID of the account managing the event.
   - **channelId**: ID of the channel where the event is hosted.
   - **sessionId**: ID for the specific session of the event.
   - **streamId**: ID for the stream (is associated with the event).
   - **ipAddress**: IP address associated with the request (null if not provided).
   - **country**: The country where the event is taking place. Default is "United States."
   - **state**: The state where the event is taking place. Default is "California."
   - **title**: Title of the video event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
   - **description**: A brief description of the event, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - **tags**: Comma-separated keywords associated with the event, e.g., "basketball,game,challenge."

2. **details**:
   - **accountId**: Repeated ID of the account managing the event.
   - **sessionId**: Repeated ID for the session.
   - **channelId**: Repeated ID of the channel.
   - **videoId**: Repeated ID for the video.
   - **title**: Repeated title of the event.
   - **description**: Repeated description of the event.
   - **tags**: Repeated tags associated with the event.
   - **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream (set as "Live").
   - **searchType**: Type of content related to search criteria, e.g., "Game."
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the event has started (true or false).
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp marking when the event started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the event is currently paused (true or false).
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp marking when the event was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the event has been stopped (true or false).
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp marking when the event was stopped (null if not applicable).
   - **streamId**: Repeated ID for the stream.
   - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the event, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel."
   - **category**: Category of the event, e.g., "Board."
   - **categoryId**: ID corresponding to the category.
   - **subCategory**: Sub-category of the event, e.g., "Outdoor Party."
   - **subCategoryId**: ID for the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the event (e.g., "2024-02-01").
   - **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the event (e.g., "18:00:00").
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours (set as 1 hour).
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event (e.g., "basketball-cover-url.jpg").
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback by the provider (currently empty).
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting (set as 100).
   - **votingTimeReset**: Duration for how long voting is available (set as "5" minutes).
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons displayed (set as 4).
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button (e.g., "Layup").
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button (e.g., "Dunk").
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled (set as false).
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament is enabled (set as true).
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button (e.g., "Hit").
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button (e.g., "Miss").
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream (e.g., "basketball-locator-name").
   - **streamAssetName**: Name used for the stream asset (e.g., "basketball-asset-name").
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing Boolean fields indicating if various platform video IDs (YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, etc.) are available or linked (all are set to false).
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing Boolean fields indicating if various platform event IDs (Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) are available or linked (all are set to false).
   - **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the event (e.g., "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam").
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used (e.g., "WirelessAudioTek Device").
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used (e.g., "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0").
   - **additionalCameras**: Array listing additional cameras and their respective microphones used (includes details for camera-2, mic-2, camera-3, mic-3).
   - **createdDate**: Date when the event was created (e.g., "2024-02-18").
   - **createdTime**: Time when the event was created (e.g., "14:54:25").
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the event details were last updated (e.g., "2024-02-24").
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the event was last updated (e.g., "23:29:19").
   - **deletedDate**: Date when the event was deleted, if applicable (null if not deleted).
   - **deletedTime**: Time when the event was deleted, if applicable (null if not deleted).

request.description:
### Video - Event - Delete - TikTok Endpoint Description

#### Request Method
- **Method**: POST
  - The HTTP verb used to make the request to this endpoint.

#### URL
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/delete`
  - The endpoint where the request is sent to delete a video event.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: application/json
  - Indicates that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
The request includes a JSON body that contains two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: "tiktok"
  - Identifies the video streaming provider as TikTok.
  
- **providerId**: ""
  - The unique identifier for the provider; currently left blank.

- **apiKey**: null
  - API key for authentication; currently not provided.

- **apiSecret**: null
  - API secret for secure access; currently not provided.

- **apiClientId**: null
  - Client ID for the API; currently not provided.

- **authToken**: null
  - Token for authentication; currently not provided.

- **server**: null
  - Specifies the server to use; currently not provided.

- **rtmpUrl**: null
  - RTMP URL for streaming; currently not provided.

- **streamKey**: null
  - Key used for the stream; currently not provided.

- **channelUrl**: null
  - URL for the channel associated with the video; currently not provided.

- **authUsername**: null
  - Username for authentication; currently not provided.

- **authPassword**: null
  - Password for authentication; currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
  - A unique identifier for this particular video event.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - The unique identifier of the video to be deleted.

- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - Identifier for the user account associated with the video.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - Identifier for the channel where the video is hosted.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - Identifier for the session associated with the video event.

- **streamId**: "streamId"
  - Identifier for the live stream; used when the video was part of a live event.

- **ipAddress**: null
  - The IP address associated with the request; currently not provided.

- **country**: "United States"
  - The country related to the video event.

- **state**: "California"
  - The state related to the video event.

- **title**: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"
  - Title of the video event.

- **description**: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - A brief description of the video event.

- **tags**: "basketball,game,challenge"
  - Tags associated with the video event for categorization.

##### Details
- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - The account identifier associated with the event.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - Session identifier related to the video event.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - Channel identifier where this video event is located.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - Unique identifier of the video being deleted.

- **title**: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"
  - Title of the video event.

- **description**: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - Description of the video event.

- **tags**: "basketball,game,challenge"
  - Tags associated with the video for categorization.

- **streamType**: "Live"
  - Indicates that the video was part of a live stream.

- **searchType**: "Game"
  - Type of content; here, it specifies that it is a game.

- **started**: true
  - Indicates if the event has started.

- **startedOn**: "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"
  - Timestamp of when the event started.

- **paused**: false
  - Indicates whether the event is paused.

- **pausedOn**: "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"
  - Timestamp of when the event was paused (if applicable).

- **stopped**: false
  - Indicates whether the event has ended.

- **stoppedOn**: null
  - Timestamp of when the event ended; currently not applicable as it hasn't ended.

- **streamId**: "streamId"
  - Unique identifier for the stream related to the event.

- **channel**: "Fortune's Basketball Channel"
  - Name of the channel associated with the event.

- **category**: "Board"
  - Category the event falls under.

- **categoryId**: "categoryId"
  - Unique identifier for the category.

- **subCategory**: "Outdoor Party"
  - Subcategory related to this event.

- **subCategoryId**: "subCategoryId"
  - Unique identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate**: "2024-02-01"
  - Scheduled date for the event.

- **scheduleTime**: "18:00:00"
  - Scheduled time for when the event will take place.

- **streamHours**: 1
  - Duration in hours that the event is expected to run.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: "basketball-cover-url.jpg"
  - URL for the cover photo of the video event.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: ""
  - URL for playback from the provider; currently not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: 100
  - Number of vote tokens available for this event.

- **votingTimeReset**: "5"
  - Duration for resetting the voting time in minutes.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: 4
  - Number of voting buttons available during the event.

- **voteButtonText1**: "Layup"
  - Text for the first voting option/button.

- **voteButtonText2**: "Dunk"
  - Text for the second voting option/button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: false
  - Indicates whether rewards are enabled for this event.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: true
  - Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled for this event.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: "Hit"
  - Text for the first option in the tournament voting.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: "Miss"
  - Text for the second option in the tournament voting.

- **streamLocatorName**: "basketball-locator-name"
  - Name assigned for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: "basketball-asset-name"
  - Asset name associated with the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**: Object with various platform-specific video IDs, all set to false, indicating no IDs are linked with other platforms.

- **platformEventIds**: Object with various platform-specific event IDs, all set to false, indicating no linked events on other platforms.

- **primaryCameraName**: "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"
  - Name of the primary camera used for the event.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: "WirelessAudioTek Device"
  - Name of the primary microphone used for the event.

- **primarySpeakerName**: "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"
  - Name of the primary speaker used for the audio output.

- **additionalCameras**: Array containing objects that represent additional cameras and microphones used in the event.

- **createdDate**: "2024-02-18"
  - Date when the event was created.

- **createdTime**: "14:54:25"
  - Time when the event was created.

- **updatedDate**: "2024-02-24"
  - Date when the event was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: "23:29:19"
  - Time when the event was last updated.

- **deletedDate**: null
  - Date when the event was deleted; currently not applicable as it hasn’t been deleted.

- **deletedTime**: null
  - Time when the event was deleted; currently not applicable as it hasn’t been deleted.

request.description:
### Video - Event - Create - Pinterest API Endpoint

**Request Method: POST**
- This endpoint is designed to create a new video event related to Pinterest.

**Request URL: `/api/video/event/create`**
- This is the endpoint where the API request will be directed to create the video event.

### Request Headers

- **Content-Type**: Specifies the type of content being sent to the server, which in this case is `application/json`.

### Request Body

The request body consists of two main sections: `options` and `details`.

#### Options Object
- **providerName**: The name of the provider (e.g., Pinterest).
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for authentication, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: The authentication token, currently set to null.
- **server**: Information about the server, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The URL for RTMP streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: The key for streaming, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this video event.
- **videoId**: The ID assigned to the video.
- **accountId**: The ID for the account associated with the video event.
- **channelId**: The ID for the channel used during the event.
- **sessionId**: The session identification for tracking.
- **streamId**: An identification for the streaming session.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user, currently null.
- **country**: The country in which the event is taking place (e.g., United States).
- **state**: The state in which the event is taking place (e.g., California).
- **title**: The title of the video event.
- **description**: A brief description of what the event is about.
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags related to the event.

#### Details Object
- **accountId**: The same account ID used in options. 
- **sessionId**: The session ID associated with this event.
- **channelId**: ID of the channel where the video is streamed.
- **videoId**: ID of the video being created.
- **title**: Title of the live event.
- **description**: Description of the event.
- **tags**: Related tags for the video event, helpful for search optimization.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream, which is currently set to "Live."
- **searchType**: Type of search relevant to the event; in this case, it is "Game."
- **started**: Boolean indicating whether the event has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the event started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the event has been paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the event was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the event has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the event stopped (currently null if not stopped).
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream session.
- **channel**: The name of the channel that is hosting the event.
- **category**: The category under which the event falls (e.g., Board).
- **categoryId**: ID corresponding to the category.
- **subCategory**: The sub-category of the event (e.g., Outdoor Party).
- **subCategoryId**: ID for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: The date when the event is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime**: Time associated with the scheduled event.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the video provider (currently empty).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: The time reset for voting options in seconds.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available for users.
- **voteButtonText1 & voteButtonText2**: Text for the first and second voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards for voting are enabled.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournament features are enabled.
- **tournamentButtonText1 & tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the tournament voting buttons.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the locator for the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing various platform-specific video IDs, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing various event IDs relevant to this event, all currently false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for sound.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and their associated microphones.
- **createdDate**: The date the video event was created.
- **createdTime**: The time the video event was created.
- **updatedDate**: The last date this video event was updated.
- **updatedTime**: The last time this video event was updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if applicable (currently null).
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable (currently null).

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Event - Update - Pinterest

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update existing resource information on the server.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/event/update**: The endpoint for updating video event data on the local server.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the type of content being sent. In this case, it's set to **application/json**, indicating that the request body contains JSON formatted data.

#### Request Body
The body of the request is structured in two main sections: `options` and `details`.

##### Options Section
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider, here it's set to **pinterest**.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, but it is currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication with the provider. Currently set to **null**.
- **apiSecret**: The secret key associated with the API, currently set to **null**.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API, left as **null**.
- **authToken**: An authentication token for the provider, currently **null**.
- **server**: The server information is set to **null**.
- **rtmpUrl**: The URL for RTMP streaming, currently set to **null**.
- **streamKey**: The key used for streaming, set to **null**.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel, currently **null**.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to **null**.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to **null**.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video event. Here, it is a placeholder value **"uniqueKey"**.
- **videoId**: The ID of the video being updated, indicated as **"videoId"**.
- **accountId**: The ID associated with the user account, currently as **"accountId"**.
- **channelId**: ID of the channel where the event occurs, currently as **"channelId"**.
- **sessionId**: The session ID for tracking purposes, indicated as **"sessionId"**.
- **streamId**: An identifier for the stream, currently as **"streamId"**.
- **ipAddress**: IP address related to the event, currently **null**.
- **country**: The country associated with the event, set as **"United States"**.
- **state**: The state associated with the event, set as **"California"**.
- **title**: Title of the video event, set as **"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"**.
- **description**: A brief description of the event, which is **"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."**.
- **tags**: Keywords related to the event set as **"basketball,game,challenge"**.

##### Details Section
- **accountId**: Repeated ID of the user account.
- **sessionId**: Repeated session ID.
- **channelId**: Repeated channel ID.
- **videoId**: Repeated video ID.
- **title**: Repeated title of the event.
- **description**: Repeated description of the event.
- **tags**: Repeated tags associated with the event.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream, in this case, set to **"Live"**.
- **searchType**: The type of search for the event, set as **"Game"**.
- **started**: Indicates if the event has started, currently set to **true**.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp when the event started, shown as **"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"**.
- **paused**: Status of the event indicating if it is paused, currently **false**.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the event was paused, same as started timestamp.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the event has been stopped, currently **false**.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the event was stopped, currently **null**.
- **streamId**: Repeated identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel as **"Fortune's Basketball Channel"**.
- **category**: Category of the event, set as **"Board"**.
- **categoryId**: The identifier for the event category, currently as **"categoryId"**.
- **subCategory**: The sub-category for the event, set to **"Outdoor Party"**.
- **subCategoryId**: The identifier for the sub-category, currently as **"subCategoryId"**.
- **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the event, marked as **"2024-02-01"**.
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the event, marked as **"18:00:00"**.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to **1**.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event, set to **"basketball-cover-url.jpg"**.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently **empty**.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting, set to **100**.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration in minutes for resetting voting, set to **"5"**.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons, set to **4**.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, set as **"Layup"**.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, set as **"Dunk"**.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the event, currently **false**.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether a tournament feature is enabled, currently **true**.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to **"Hit"**.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to **"Miss"**.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream, set to **"basketball-locator-name"**.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the stream asset, set to **"basketball-asset-name"**.
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing IDs related to various streaming platforms, all currently set to **false**.
- **platformEventIds**: An object containing IDs for events on different platforms, all currently set to **false**.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the event, set as **"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"**.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, set to **"WirelessAudioTek Device"**.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, set to **"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"**.
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional cameras and their respective microphones used.
  - Each entry consists of a **camera** and **microphone** name pair.
- **createdDate**: The date when the event was created, set to **"2024-02-18"**.
- **createdTime**: The time when the event was created, set to **"14:54:25"**.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the event was last updated, set to **"2024-02-24"**.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the event was last updated, set to **"23:29:19"**.
- **deletedDate**: The date when the event was deleted, currently **null**.
- **deletedTime**: The time when the event was deleted, currently **null**.
